description.en: During the Chenghua era, the Ming and Joseon dynasties jointly attacked the Jianzhou Jurchens.

description.zh-cn: 处处制约同治帝，使其一生未获实权。
辛酉政变后，载淳的年号由“祺祥”改为“同治”，其母慈禧太后与嫡母慈安太后开始垂帘听政。
同治帝在位期间，清朝剿灭了太平天国运动。
曹丕是曹操和武宣卞皇后的嫡长子。
曹叡是曹丕与文昭甄皇后所生之子。
曹叡是曹丕与文昭甄皇后所生之子。
建安九年（204年），冀州邺城被曹操攻破，甄氏被曹丕所纳。
曹丕是曹昂的异母弟。
description.en: Cao Pi was Cao Ang's younger half-brother.

description.zh-cn: 同父母兄弟
同父母兄弟
曹丕迫使汉献帝禅让，建立曹魏。
与曹植争夺世子之位，曹丕即位后不仅对其实行政治迫害，甚至屡次欲杀害曹植。
description.en: Became rivals over the succession, Cao Pi repeatedly attempted to kill Cao Zhi after ascending the throne.

description.zh-cn: 因甄氏失意有怨言，曹丕大怒，于黄初二年（221年）六月遣使赐死甄氏。
孙权拒绝派儿子为人质并拒绝向曹魏称臣后，曹丕发动多次伐吴战争，双方走向敌对。
因夏侯尚宠爱妾侍，曹丕下令处死其妾，导致夏侯尚精神衰弱至死。
曹丕的重臣，并被任命为托孤大臣辅佐魏明帝曹叡。
曹丕的重臣。曹丕临终时，令司马懿为辅政大臣之一，并被任命为托孤大臣辅佐魏明帝曹叡。

position.zh-cn: 尚书、督军、御史中丞、侍中、尚书右仆射

description.zh-cn: 2024年6月27日被开除军籍。
2024年6月27日被开除党籍。
魏凤和在李克强担任总理期间任国务委员兼国防部长。
魏凤和在习近平担任军委主席期间任中央军委委员、国务委员、国防部长。
提名魏凤和为国务委员和国防部部长。
中国人民解放军第二炮兵部队升格并改制为中国人民解放军火箭军。
决定给予魏凤和开除军籍处分，取消其火箭军上将军衔。
自1977年开始同居。
description.en: Began cohabiting in 1977.

description.zh-cn: 1997年10月8日至2011年12月17日担任朝鲜劳动党总书记。
description.en: Served as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea from October 8, 1997, to December 17, 2011.

description.zh-cn: 普京访问朝鲜时举行会谈。
description.en: Held talks when Putin visited North Korea.

description.zh-cn: 金正日对中华人民共和国进行非正式访问。
description.en: Kim Jong-il made an unofficial visit to the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 金正日对中华人民共和国进行了多次非正式访问。
description.en: Kim Jong-il made multiple unofficial visits to the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 会晤并签署《日朝平壤宣言》，金正日承认并就绑架日本人问题道歉。
description.en: Met and signed the Japan–North Korea Pyongyang Declaration, where Kim Jong-il admitted to and apologized for the abduction of Japanese citizens.

description.zh-cn: 克林顿访问朝鲜协调释放美国记者事宜。
description.en: Clinton visited North Korea to coordinate the release of American journalists.

description.zh-cn: 在小布什任内，朝美关系陷入了僵局和对立。
description.en: During George W. Bush's presidency, US-North Korea relations reached a stalemate and were confrontational.

description.zh-cn: 金正男因2001年持假护照访问日本而失宠，丧失继承可能性，后有传闻称其曾遭金正日、金正恩父子暗杀。
description.en: Kim Jong-nam fell out of favor after a 2001 incident involving a fake passport to visit Japan, losing the possibility of succession. It was later rumored he was targeted for assassination by Kim Jong-il and Kim Jong-un.

description.zh-cn: 裕仁是大正天皇的长子。
description.en: Hirohito was the eldest son of Emperor Taishō.

description.zh-cn: 乃木希典作为学习院院长，对裕仁进行了“质实刚健”的尚武教育。
description.en: As the director of Gakushūin, Nogi Maresuke educated Hirohito with a focus on martial spirit and robustness.

description.zh-cn: 据称731部队是奉天皇敕令建立的。
description.en: Unit 731 was reportedly established by imperial decree from the Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 镇压皇道派发动的二二六兵变，使统制派获胜并掌握军部实权。
description.en: The suppression of the Kōdōha-led February 26 Incident allowed the Tōseiha faction to win and control the military.

description.zh-cn: 和珅是乾隆帝时期的权臣，深受其宠信。
乾隆帝驾崩后，嘉庆帝迅速宣布和珅二十条大罪，下旨抄家并赐其自尽。
阮氏清是胡志明的姐姐。
在香港整合成立越南共产党。
化名胡光，参加中国共产党，学习革命经验。
在越南战争中，胡志明领导的北越与支持南越的美国为敌对关系。
两人有着深厚的友谊。
两人有着深厚的友谊。
两人有着深厚的友谊。
胡志明在1966年会见周恩来和邓小平。
胡志明在1966年会见周恩来和邓小平。
柯西金在参加完胡志明葬礼回国途中，路过北京，于首都国际机场与周恩来举行了秘密的短促会晤，此举使因珍宝岛事件而极度紧张的中苏关系稍有缓和。
description.en: After attending Ho Chi Minh's funeral, Kosygin made a stopover in Beijing and held a secret meeting with Zhou Enlai at the airport, slightly easing the extremely tense Sino-Soviet relations caused by the Zhenbao Island incident.

description.zh-cn: 胡志明思想是他所倡导的革命理论与思想体系。
胡志明思想至今仍在越南政治与社会中具有重要影响力。
曹操的父亲曹嵩是夏侯惇的叔父，二人为从父兄弟关系。
在赤壁之战、濡须口之战等多次战役中为敌对关系。
曹操为曹魏政权奠定了基础。
在诸葛亮北伐期间，受其指挥作为疑军行动。
在长坂坡之战中，从曹操大军中救出刘禅母子，使其幸免于难。
description.en: Protected Liu Shan and his mother at the Battle of Changban, ensuring their survival.

description.zh-cn: 在汉中之战中，黄忠出击逾期未归，赵云率数十骑出营接应，并从曹操大军的包围中救出黄忠。
description.en: During the Battle of Hanzhong, when Huang Zhong did not return from a sortie on time, Zhao Yun led dozens of cavalry out of the camp to provide support and rescued Huang Zhong from the encirclement of Cao Cao's main army.

description.zh-cn: 刘备平定益州后，劝说刘备将田宅房产归还百姓以安民心，并被采纳。
在汉中之战后，称赞赵云“子龙一身都是胆也”，提升了其军中威望。
率领常山郡义军反叛袁绍，投奔公孙瓒。
在箕谷作为疑军与曹真率领的魏国大军作战。
刘备与赵云感情深厚，曾同床眠卧。
虞姬是项羽的妻子。
范增是项羽的主要谋士，被尊为“亚父”。
项羽因不信任范增，导致其离开。
章邯在巨鹿之战后率部投降项羽。
韩信曾在项羽帐下任执戟郎，因不受重用而离开。
韩信离开项羽后投奔刘邦，并被重用。
上海的红卫兵将宋庆龄父母的坟墓毁坏且将尸体曝出。
description.en: Red Guards in Shanghai destroyed the graves of Soong Ching-ling's parents and exhumed their bodies.

description.zh-cn: 因国家主席及副主席职务被废止，宋庆龄改任全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: Due to the abolition of the positions of State Chairman and Vice Chairman, Soong Ching-ling was reassigned to be Vice Chairperson of the NPC Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 在宋庆龄临终前，王光美询问其是否愿意加入中国共产党，促成了她入党。
description.en: Shortly before Soong Ching-ling's death, Wang Guangmei asked if she was willing to join the CCP, which led to her admission.

description.zh-cn: 元配
description.en: Principal wife

description.zh-cn: 戚夫人是刘如意的生母。
张良加入刘邦部队，成为其重要谋士，协助其建立汉朝。
刘邦在楚汉战争中最终获胜，得以统一天下，建立汉朝。
刘邦起兵反秦，并率先攻入关中，接受秦王子婴投降，灭亡秦朝。
刘邦进入关中后，为了安抚民心，宣布废除秦朝苛法，约法三章。
晚年宠爱戚夫人，多次想废黜太子刘盈，改立其子刘如意为太子。
刘邦死后，吕后将戚夫人囚禁、虐待，并最终将其虐杀，命名为“人彘”。
description.en: Empress Lü had Consort Qi killed.

description.zh-cn: 斯大林在列宁去世后与托洛茨基展开权力斗争，最终将托洛茨基驱逐并派人将其暗杀。
description.en: After Lenin's death, Stalin engaged in a power struggle with Trotsky, eventually exiling and assassinating him.

description.zh-cn: 斯大林在与托洛茨基的斗争中曾与季诺维也夫结盟，后将其作为“新反对派”清除。
description.en: Stalin allied with Zinoviev against Trotsky, but later eliminated him as part of the 'New Opposition'.

description.zh-cn: 斯大林在清除“左派”后，将支持新经济政策的布哈林作为右倾投降主义集团清除。
description.en: After eliminating the 'Left Opposition', Stalin purged Bukharin, who supported the NEP, as a 'Right Deviation'.

description.zh-cn: 签订《苏德互不侵犯条约》，形成暂时性合作关系。
description.en: Signed the Molotov–Ribbentrop Pact, forming a temporary cooperative relationship.

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国入侵苏联后，双方成为战争中的主要对手。
description.en: After Nazi Germany invaded the Soviet Union, the two became major adversaries in the war.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，斯大林领导的苏联与中国结盟。
description.en: After the founding of the PRC, the Soviet Union under Stalin's leadership allied with China.

description.zh-cn: 被怀疑在斯大林中风后故意延误治疗，甚至下毒谋杀斯大林。
description.en: Suspected of intentionally delaying medical treatment or even poisoning Stalin after his stroke.

description.zh-cn: 以其谋略辅佐朱元璋开创明朝。

position.zh-cn: 高安县丞、江浙儒学副提举

description.zh-cn: 刘基考中元朝进士后曾担任数个官职，后皆弃官。
胡惟庸对与刘基的旧怨怀恨在心，后在刘基病重时派医生医治，刘基服药后病情加重，疑似被其毒害。
胡惟庸派医生为刘基治病，刘基服药后病情加重，终至死亡。
刘基反对朱元璋任命胡惟庸为丞相，比喻他可能会“偾辕”（弄翻车）。
与宋濂并称为“明初诗文三大家”。朱元璋攻下浙东后，同时听闻刘基和宋濂等人的名声并进行招聘。
在小牧长久手之战中与德川家康对立。
德川家康最终臣服于丰臣秀吉。
命令茶人千利休切腹自尽。
淀殿是丰臣秀吉的侧室。
明穆宗是明世宗第三子。
宣布废除海禁，实行隆庆开关。
托洛茨基被任命组建和领导工农红军。
description.en: Trotsky was appointed to organize and lead the Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 作为中共强硬派代表，主张武力镇压学生运动。
六四事件后，江泽民取代赵紫阳，被中共元老选为新任中共中央总书记。
习仲勋是中共八大元老之一。
与刘锦成曾就读于同一个EMBA班。
王凤是王莽的伯父。
王凤临终时嘱咐王政君照顾王莽，为王莽的仕途提供了帮助。
王莽将匈奴单于降格为“降奴服于”，并收回其印玺，导致双方关系破裂，边境战争不绝。
王莽将高句丽王降格，并改其国名为“下句丽”，导致其反叛。
张成泽是金正日的妹夫。
张成泽是金正恩的姑父。
2013年12月8日被开除党籍。
在金正日执政期间，张成泽是其核心干部。
在金正恩掌权初期，张成泽是辅佐金正恩的核心人物，被视为“二号人物”。
金正恩主导解除了张成泽的职务，并最终将其处决。
根据朝中社报道，张成泽在审判中承认图谋发动政变以推翻金正恩。
2012年8月张成泽访华时与时任中共中央总书记胡锦涛会面。
据称张成泽在与胡锦涛会面时，表明想要让金正男担任朝鲜最高领导人。
据称周永康将张成泽支持金正男的消息转告金正恩，直接导致张成泽被处决。
因被金正日怀疑搞宗派活动而被撤职。
中、晚唐写实诗人白居易是继杜甫之后实际派文学的重要领袖人物之一，其讽谕诗的创作受到杜诗的很大影响和激励。
description.en: Bai Juyi, a realist poet of the Mid-Late Tang, was one of the important leaders of the realist literary school after Du Fu. His satirical poetry creation was greatly influenced and inspired by Du Fu's poetry.

description.zh-cn: 江西诗派奉杜甫为“一祖”，师法其诗歌风格与技巧。
邀请宋楚瑜担任APEC中华台北领袖代表。
分别于2014年访问中国大陆及2016年APEC会议期间与习近平会面。
洪秀柱到南京会见宋涛。
洪秀柱提出“一中同表”作为其核心两岸政策主张。
洪秀柱认为所谓的种族灭绝和强迫劳动是美国和西方炮制的“谎言”。
洪秀柱多次批评蔡英文的政治立场，两人是2016年总统选举的主要对手。

position.zh-cn: 中国国民党政策委员会执行长

description.zh-cn: 洪秀柱当选党主席后，蔡正元被任命为政策会执行长，并在其党主席任期内履职。
因剪发事件，乾隆帝大怒，认为皇后“平日恨我必深”，将其幽禁于翊坤宫后殿。
乾隆帝参考顺治帝册封董鄂妃为皇贵妃的先例，册封那拉氏为摄六宫事皇贵妃。
根据《皇明书》记载，詹徽与皇太子审理囚犯时，坚持重法，与主张宽仁的太子发生争执。朱元璋支持詹徽，使太子大受惊吓，因而感疾去世。
与30多位作家、艺术家一道被挂牌批斗、侮辱、毒打。
老舍任中国文学艺术界联合会副主席期间，郭沫若是主席。
1949年，应周恩来委托文艺界之邀回到北京。
在1950年代的政治运动中参与批判“丁、陈反党集团”。
在1950年代的政治运动中参与批判吴祖光等人的右派言论。
副部长级

position.zh-cn: 党组书记、副主席、书记处第一书记

description.zh-cn: 晋升正部级
陈希发文点名周永康等人是“政治野心家、阴谋家”。
陈希发文点名薄熙来等人是“政治野心家、阴谋家”。
陈希发文点名郭伯雄等人是“政治野心家、阴谋家”。
陈希发文点名孙政才等人是“政治野心家、阴谋家”。
陈希发文点名令计划等人是“政治野心家、阴谋家”。
陈希在清华大学工作时的老同事。
姜信治是陈希在中组部的副职，并接替陈希担任中组部常务副部长。
慎海雄担任中共中央宣传部副部长期间，黄坤明为部长。
慎海雄担任中共中央宣传部副部长期间，李书磊为部长。
慎海雄担任中央广播电视总台台长及中国中央电视台台长期间，李克强为国务院总理。
慎海雄担任中央广播电视总台台长期间，李强为国务院总理。
授予慎海雄友谊勋章。
卓琳是邓朴方的母亲。

position.en: Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee

description.zh-cn: 邓朴方担任第十一届全国政协副主席期间，贾庆林为时任主席。
邓朴方等人创建了中国康华发展总公司。
授予邓朴方“联合国人权奖”。
授意吴法宪任命其子林立果在空军担任要职。
被描述为林立果的心腹。
率国民党籍立法委员赴中国大陆参访期间会见。
孙策临终前，将自己的印绶和兵符交给二弟孙权，选择他作为自己的继承人。
description.en: On his deathbed, Sun Ce passed his seal and military authority to his younger brother Sun Quan, choosing him as his successor.

description.zh-cn: 向孙权提出袭取荆州的战略，并得到采纳。
为避免两线作战，孙权曾向曹丕称臣，受封为吴王。

position.zh-cn: 中护军、左都督、南郡太守

description.zh-cn: 孙策去世后，与张昭共同辅佐孙权。
李仙蕙因得罪张易之、张昌宗兄弟被武则天赐死。
吕后设计毒杀了刘如意。
description.en: Empress Lü had Liu Ruyi killed.

description.zh-cn: 汉文帝在位期间，匈奴多次大规模入侵汉朝边境。
description.en: During Emperor Wen's reign, the Xiongnu launched multiple large-scale invasions of the Han border.

description.zh-cn: 契仔（干儿子）关系。
description.en: Godson relationship.

description.zh-cn: 在孟建柱于上海任职期间，其才干受到江泽民的注意和赏识。
在孟建柱于上海任职期间，其才干受到朱镕基的注意和赏识。
孟建柱担任中共上海市委副书记期间，黄菊为市委书记。

position.zh-cn: 中共中央政法委副书记

description.zh-cn: 孟建柱担任中共中央政法委副书记期间，周永康为书记。
孟建柱担任公安部长和国务委员期间，温家宝为国务院总理。

position.zh-cn: 中共中央政法委员会书记

description.zh-cn: 孟建柱担任中央政法委书记期间，习近平为中共中央总书记。
孟建柱主导的政法系统改革被外界看作是对周永康时代中国政法体系的一次系统性拨乱反正。
在韩国独立运动初期，两人因思想相同而结为好友。
description.en: In the early days of the Korean independence movement, the two became good friends due to their similar ideologies.

description.zh-cn: 在张德洙被暗杀后，两人关系决裂。金九于1949年被暗杀，外界指李承晚是幕后黑手。
description.en: After the assassination of Chang Tŏk-su, their relationship broke down. Kim Koo was assassinated in 1949, and Syngman Rhee was alleged to be behind it.

description.zh-cn: 评论指称是李承晚派人暗杀金九，刺客安斗熙是受时任李承晚政府国防部长官申性模的指示。
description.en: It is alleged that Syngman Rhee sent people to assassinate Kim Koo, with the assassin Ahn Doo-hee acting under the orders of Shin Sung-mo, the Minister of National Defense in Rhee's government.

description.zh-cn: 时任美国总统威尔逊阻止李承晚参加巴黎和会，使其无法获得出境护照。
description.en: Then-U.S. President Wilson prevented Syngman Rhee from attending the Paris Peace Conference, making him unable to obtain an exit passport.

description.zh-cn: 执政时期，韩国和中华人民共和国处在互不承认的敌对状态，并在朝鲜战争中直接对抗。
description.en: During his rule, South Korea and the People's Republic of China were in a state of mutual non-recognition and hostility, directly confronting each other in the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 李承晚政府划定“李承晚线”，在独岛等问题上与日本关系紧张，直至其下台也未能建交。
description.en: The Syngman Rhee government established the "Syngman Rhee Line," leading to tense relations with Japan over issues like the Liancourt Rocks (Dokdo/Takeshima), and diplomatic relations were not established before he was overthrown.

description.zh-cn: 二战结束后，李承晚乘坐美国专机返回韩国，并在美国支持下建立政府。
description.en: After World War II, Syngman Rhee returned to Korea on a US plane and established his government with American support.

description.zh-cn: 因与任平、郑宝用的矛盾，李一男被调离中央研究部。
明光宗朱常洛与朱常洵是同父异母的兄弟。
因其子朱常洵深得明神宗宠爱，郑贵妃时刻想为朱常洵争夺储君之位，与太子朱常洛对立。
明熹宗朱由校是明光宗的长子。
明光宗在位时间仅一月。
将明光宗安葬于明庆陵。
祖孙关系
建安中期，袁绍为次子袁熙娶甄氏为妻。
受曹丕遗诏辅佐曹叡。
受曹丕遗诏辅佐曹叡，后在魏明帝（曹叡）朝中担任重要将领，并负责抵抗蜀汉北伐。曹叡临终时，托孤于司马懿和曹爽。
受曹丕遗诏辅佐曹叡。
曹叡在位期间指挥军队成功防御了孙权的多次攻伐。
曹叡在位期间指挥军队成功防御了诸葛亮的五次北伐。
与陈群等人一同制定《魏律》。
临终前托孤，任命曹爽为大将军，与司马懿共同辅佐曹芳。
临终前托孤，任命司马懿与曹爽共同辅佐曹芳。
两人在共同辅政期间权力斗争激烈，最终司马懿通过高平陵之变消灭了曹爽。
同胞兄弟
异母兄弟
因朝臣警告，终明帝一朝，曹植未得重用。
鼎力支持李正皓参选立法委员。
政治上的紧密盟友，有多次协同政治行动。
搭档参选1996年中华民国总统选举。
积极主张要求日本政府将台湾原住民阵亡祖灵迁出靖国神社，并多次前往抗议。
向日本法院提出控告小泉纯一郎首相参拜靖国神社违宪。
接见高金素梅，称赞其为台湾原住民进行的斗争。
彭帅称与张高丽曾维持长达10多年的婚外情和不伦恋关系。
description.en: Peng Shuai claimed to have had an extramarital affair and an intermittent relationship with Zhang Gaoli for over 10 years.

description.zh-cn: 李弘是其同母兄长。
太平公主是其同母妹妹。
作为傀儡皇帝，政事决于太后武则天。
禅让帝位予母亲武则天。
再度禅让于李隆基。
夺门之变后，于谦被石亨等人诬陷谋逆，下狱处死。
听信徐有贞等人谗言，下令将于谦处以死刑。
在明代宗（景泰帝）时期任兵部尚书，深受信任。
因于谦在平定朱高煦之乱中表现出色而器重他。
于谦之子于冕在成化年间上疏为父鸣冤，促使朝廷为于谦平反。
与徐志摩有着深厚的友谊。
与沈从文有着深厚的友谊。
获选为国徽设计组成员，带领清华大学设计组提出草案，并参与修正最终方案。
参与修正国徽方案。
于1985年叛逃。
潜伏于中央情报局40多年。
刘禅是蜀汉的第二位也是最后一位皇帝，在位41年。
description.en: Liu Shan was the second and last emperor of Shu Han, reigning for 41 years.

description.zh-cn: 在邓艾兵临城下时，劝说刘禅放弃抵抗，向曹魏投降。
description.en: When Deng Ai's army approached the capital, he persuaded Liu Shan to give up resistance and surrender to Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 章孝慈促成李敖至东吴大学历史学系任客座教授，两人结为好友。
李敖曾控告郁慕明，后两人成为好友。
李敖在节目上回批刘晓波，暗讽其没有资格骂中共。
因文绣提出离婚而迁怒婉容，后因婉容与侍卫私通怀孕而关系彻底破裂，将其打入冷宫。
在天津居住期间因争宠而关系不和，经常发生冲突。
中共游击队俘虏婉容，并将其辗转关押，婉容最终死于狱中。

position.zh-cn: 文学掾、太子中庶子、黄门侍郎、议郎、丞相东曹属、丞相主簿

description.zh-cn: 司马懿历任曹操属下多个职位。
周瑜看出袁术并无成就，后离开袁术转投孙策。
孙策与周瑜自少年时期便是情如兄弟的好友，周瑜在孙策起兵时便率兵物资来投，是其重要的支持者和将领。
description.en: Sun Ce and Zhou Yu were close friends like brothers since their youth. Zhou Yu joined Sun Ce with troops and supplies when he began his campaign, becoming a key supporter and general.

description.zh-cn: 周瑜主动与鲁肃结交，两人成为挚友。
在赤壁之战中作为联军主要指挥官，以火攻大败曹军，阻止其南下。
在南郡之战中率军大破曹仁，成功夺取江陵。
劝说孙权拒绝向曹操送人质并坚决抗曹。
曾向孙权建议软禁刘备以削弱其势力，但未被采纳。
因需联合各路英雄对抗曹操，不采纳周瑜软禁刘备的计策。
洪秀全是太平天国运动的民变领袖。
洪秀全早年接触基督教思想，并据此创立拜上帝会。
湘军是镇压太平天国的主要力量，最终攻陷天京。
曾国藩率湘军与太平天国作战，并在洪秀全死后下令对其戮尸焚骨。
定都天京后，洪秀全主张把四书五经列为禁书。
姐夫
description.en: Brother-in-law

description.zh-cn: 继女
description.en: Stepdaughter

description.zh-cn: 姚明于2018年7月9日从上海交通大学毕业。
description.en: Yao Ming graduated from Shanghai Jiao Tong University on July 9, 2018.

description.zh-cn: 姚明于2013年当选为第十二届全国政协委员。
description.en: Yao Ming was elected as a member of the 12th National Committee of the CPPCC in 2013.

description.zh-cn: 特雷西·麦克格雷迪于2004年加入火箭队，与姚明组成“姚麦组合”，是球队核心搭档。
description.en: Tracy McGrady joined the Rockets in 2004, forming the "Yao-Mac combo" with Yao Ming as the team's core duo.

description.zh-cn: 在长征途中得悉张国焘拒绝执行中共中央的北上方针，立即将此事报告毛泽东，促使中央率领红一方面军主力先行北上。
多次向华国锋提议请邓小平重新出来工作，并在邓小平复出后予以高度评价和支持。
传说万贵妃在明孝宗幼年时意图加害于他。
明孝宗即位后，罢逐了前朝奸佞之臣李孜省。
为于谦建祠平冤，恢复其名誉。
因处理天津教案屈从洋人而遭到舆论谴责，声誉大受影响，甚至被称为“曾国贼”。
description.en: His handling of the Tianjin Massacre by yielding to foreigners led to public condemnation, severely damaging his reputation, and he was even called 'Zeng the traitor'.

description.zh-cn: 青年时代的毛泽东表示独服曾国藩，晚年也称其为地主阶级最厉害的人物。
description.en: In his youth, Mao Zedong expressed his admiration solely for Zeng Guofan, and in his later years, he called him the most formidable figure of the landlord class.

description.zh-cn: 1992年与刘德华、黎明、郭富城被香港媒体获封为“四大天王”。
description.en: In 1992, he was named one of the "Four Heavenly Kings" by the Hong Kong media, along with Andy Lau, Leon Lai, and Aaron Kwok.

description.zh-cn: 王家卫执导的《旺角卡门》让张学友的演技受到瞩目，此后张学友成为王家卫的御用演员之一。
description.en: Wong Kar-wai's direction in "As Tears Go By" brought attention to Jacky Cheung's acting, and he subsequently became one of Wong's regular actors.

description.zh-cn: 邵仁枚是邵逸夫的兄长，人称三哥。
description.en: Shao Ren Me was the elder brother of Run Run Shaw, also known as 'Third elder brother'.

description.zh-cn: 邵逸夫因认为李小龙片酬要求过高而拒绝合作，导致李小龙转投竞争对手嘉禾。
description.en: Run Run Shaw rejected a collaboration with Bruce Lee due to his high salary demands, leading Lee to join rival Golden Harvest.

description.zh-cn: 派曹彬领军攻打南唐。
奉宋太祖之命，出兵协助宋军攻打南唐。
此战役导致李煜被俘。
拒绝李煜合作抗宋的请求，并将李煜的信件交给宋朝。
据信，赵光义因李煜所作《虞美人》词中有“故国不堪回首月明中”之句，怀念故国而下令用牵机毒将其毒死。
description.en: It is believed that Zhao Guangyi ordered Li Yu to be poisoned with 'qianji' poison because of his poem 'Yu Meiren', which contained phrases like 'How can I bear to recall my lost homeland under the bright moon', expressing nostalgia for his lost kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 李煜向徐铉表示后悔当初错杀李平。
笃信佛教，酷好浮屠，崇塔庙，度僧尼，以致颇废政事。
戚夫人是汉高祖刘邦的宠妃。
为吕后出谋划策，帮助她保住了其子刘盈的太子之位。
接替胡锦涛担任中共中央总书记和中共中央军委主席。
description.en: Succeeded Hu Jintao as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee and Chairman of the CCP Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 李锐对习近平学历的真实性持怀疑态度，并批评其刚愎自用。
description.en: Li Rui was skeptical of the authenticity of Xi Jinping's academic qualifications and criticized him for being obstinate.

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞公开严厉批判中共中央总书记习近平，称其为“黑帮老大”，导致她被开除党籍。
description.en: Cai Xia publicly and severely criticized CCP General Secretary Xi Jinping, calling him a 'mafia boss', which led to her expulsion from the party.

description.zh-cn: 中美贸易战对习近平任内的中美关系和经济造成冲击。
description.en: The China-U.S. trade war impacted Sino-U.S. relations and the economy during Xi Jinping's term.

description.zh-cn: “杨家将事件”中，杨尚昆、杨白冰兄弟被指一度架空江泽民的军权。
“杨家将事件”中，杨尚昆、杨白冰兄弟被指一度架空江泽民的军权。
两人在上海和中央共事期间相处融洽，建立了密切的合作关系。
狄仁杰在武则天时期担任宰相。
description.en: Di Renjie served as chancellor during the reign of Wu Zetian.

description.zh-cn: 狄仁杰在武则天时代的贡献为后来的开元盛世奠定了基础。
description.en: Di Renjie's contributions during the Wu Zetian era laid the foundation for the subsequent Kaiyuan Flourishing Age.

description.zh-cn: 追封狄仁杰为梁国公。
description.en: Posthumously ennobled Di Renjie as the Duke of Liang.

description.zh-cn: 上谏劝阻武则天停止建造耗资巨大的浮屠大像。
description.en: Advised Wu Zetian to stop the costly construction of a giant Buddha statue.

description.zh-cn: 曹操率军攻破袁绍的根据地邺城。
曹操率军攻破邺城，导致袁熙与妻子甄氏分离。
即位后追尊其母为文昭皇后，并为其改葬、立庙祭祀。
在一次空袭中，被日本军机炸死于蒋家老宅丰镐房外。
庄子的思想继承和发展了老子的思想，其学说要本归于老子之言。
description.en: Zhuangzi's thought inherited and developed Laozi's thought; his doctrine is fundamentally based on Laozi's words.

description.zh-cn: 庄周与孟子是同时代的人物。
description.en: Zhuangzi and Mencius were contemporaries.

description.zh-cn: 于天宝初年下诏，追封庄周为南华真人。
description.en: In the early Tianbao era, he issued an edict to posthumously honor Zhuang Zhou as Nanhua Zhenren.

description.zh-cn: 追封庄周为“微妙元通真君”。
description.en: Posthumously honored Zhuang Zhou as 'Weimiao Yuantong Zhenjun'.

description.zh-cn: 批评儒家的“仁义”违背人性，反对其等级观念和礼法治国。
description.en: Criticized Confucian concepts of 'benevolence and righteousness' as being against human nature, and opposed its hierarchical concepts and rule by rites.

description.zh-cn: 反对法家以法律治国的主张。
description.en: Opposed the Legalist proposition of governing by law.

description.zh-cn: 借盗跖之口批评孔子是“鲁之巧伪人”。
description.en: Through the voice of the character Robber Zhi, criticized Confucius as a 'cunning and hypocritical man of Lu'.

description.zh-cn: 巩俐与张艺谋因拍摄《红高粱》相识相恋，曾有过长达八年的恋情并合作了多部电影，后于1995年分手。
description.en: Gong Li and Zhang Yimou met and fell in love during the filming of 'Red Sorghum'. They had an eight-year romantic relationship, collaborated on several films, and broke up in 1995.

description.zh-cn: 因拍摄《千里走单骑》结下友谊。
description.en: Became friends during the filming of 'Riding Alone for Thousands of Miles'.

description.zh-cn: 跟随毛泽东参加秋收起义。
在长征途中举荐起用张宗逊。
在大同集宁战役中，张宗逊率部与傅作义部交战后惨败。
毛泽东向黄永胜询问张宗逊去向，促使其被任命为济南军区副司令员。
吕布袭取下邳，与刘备、张飞交战。
在长坂坡之战中，张飞率二十骑据水断桥，阻挡了曹操的追兵。
在汉中之战期间，刘备分遣张飞、马超、吴兰等攻取武都。
毕业于其前身爱德华七世医药学院。
description.en: Graduated from its predecessor, the King Edward VII College of Medicine.

description.zh-cn: 因在五一三事件后公开批评时任首相东姑阿都拉曼而被巫统开除。
description.en: Expelled from UMNO for openly criticizing then-Prime Minister Tunku Abdul Rahman after the 13 May incident.

description.zh-cn: 在胡先翁担任首相期间，马哈迪是其副手。
description.en: Mahathir was Hussein Onn's deputy during his premiership.

description.zh-cn: 1998年亚洲金融危机期间，马哈迪因政策分歧革除了安华的副首相职务，两人关系破裂并成为长期的政治对手。他们曾在2018年短暂结盟，但在2020年政治危机后关系再度破裂。
description.en: During the 1998 Asian financial crisis, Mahathir dismissed Anwar as Deputy Prime Minister over policy differences, leading to a breakdown in their relationship and making them long-term political rivals. They formed a brief alliance in 2018 but their relationship broke down again after the 2020 political crisis.

description.zh-cn: 马哈迪退休后，开始批评他亲自挑选的继任者阿都拉·巴达威的政策。
description.en: After retiring, Mahathir began to criticize the policies of his handpicked successor, Abdullah Ahmad Badawi.

description.zh-cn: 因一个马来西亚发展有限公司丑闻（1MDB）而成为纳吉的激烈批评者，并领导反对派推翻其政府。
description.en: Became a fierce critic of Najib over the 1MDB scandal and led the opposition to overthrow his government.

description.zh-cn: 习近平与马哈迪通话，马哈迪对新冠肺炎疫情表示慰问，习近平称马哈迪为“中国人民的老朋友”。
description.en: Xi Jinping and Mahathir had a phone call where Mahathir expressed sympathy regarding the COVID-19 pandemic, and Xi referred to Mahathir as an "old friend of the Chinese people".

description.zh-cn: 笃信道教，好长生不老之术，每年不断修设斋醮，并在西苑修仙。
description.en: He was a devout believer in Taoism, sought immortality, held numerous Taoist ceremonies annually, and practiced self-cultivation in the West Park.

description.zh-cn: 明世宗深居西苑后，将政令皆交由严嵩父子打理，使其专权近二十年。
description.en: After retreating to the West Park, the Jiajing Emperor delegated all government affairs to Yan Song and his son, allowing them to monopolize power for nearly 20 years.

description.zh-cn: 嘉靖年间多次率领蒙古鞑靼部落寇边。
description.en: Led Mongol Tatar tribes to raid the border multiple times during the Jiajing era.

description.zh-cn: 嘉靖年间侵扰中国东南沿海，造成严重破坏。
description.en: Raided the southeastern coast of China during the Jiajing era, causing severe destruction.

description.zh-cn: 张艺谋导演了多部由莫言小说改编的电影。
联邦调查局指控钱学森在入籍申请中隐瞒其共产党外围组织活动，导致其机密工作许可被吊销。
description.en: The FBI accused Qian Xuesen of concealing his activities in communist front organizations on his naturalization application, leading to the revocation of his security clearance.

description.zh-cn: 钱学森为中华人民共和国的火箭、导弹和航天计划做出了重大贡献。
description.en: Qian Xuesen made significant contributions to the People's Republic of China's rocket, missile, and space programs.

description.zh-cn: 钱学森是加州理工学院喷气推进实验室的主要创建者之一，为美国的火箭和航天计划做出了重大贡献。
description.en: Qian Xuesen was one of the main founders of the Jet Propulsion Laboratory at Caltech and made significant contributions to the U.S. rocket and space programs.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间保护了钱学森，使其免受冲击。
description.en: Protected Qian Xuesen from persecution during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 钱学森因支持人体特异功能研究，与持反对意见的于光远发生激烈争论。
宋高宗是宋徽宗第九子。
宋孝宗为宋高宗的养子。
宋高宗为与金人缔结和约而重用主和派秦桧。
宋高宗罢免主战派大臣李纲。
金朝与南宋长期处于军事对峙状态。
宋高宗禅让皇位于养子赵昚（宋孝宗）。
陪同曾庆红参观上海韩天衡美术馆。
description.en: Accompanied Zeng Qinghong on a visit to the Han Tianheng Art Museum in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 陪同吴邦国视察上海工博会中国科学院展区。
description.en: Accompanied Wu Bangguo to inspect the Chinese Academy of Sciences exhibition area at the Shanghai Industry Fair.

description.zh-cn: 据报道，两人关系密切。
description.en: Reportedly had a close relationship.

description.zh-cn: 陈晓丹是陈元之女。
在帕米拉咨询公司之后任职。

position.zh-cn: 竞选办公室核心幕僚、市长办公室主任
position.en: Core campaign staff, Director of the Mayor's Office

description.zh-cn: 被视为柯文哲的“第一心腹”和贯彻“柯氏管理精神”的关键人物。
被外界视为柯文哲的“第一心腹”。
在2024年中华民国立法委员选举中，于台中市第一选举区竞争立法委员席位。
作为中共中央政治局委员和地方主要领导，在以习近平为核心的党中央领导下工作。多次公开表态拥护“习核心”。
description.en: As a member of the Politburo and a key regional leader, he works under the party central committee with Xi Jinping at its core. He has publicly expressed support for 'Xi Core' on multiple occasions.

description.zh-cn: 在李铁映任中共辽宁省委书记和电子工业部部长期间担任其秘书。
description.en: Served as secretary to Li Tieying when he was Party Secretary of Liaoning Province and Minister of Electronics Industry.

description.zh-cn: 在李鸿忠担任深圳市委书记期间，张德江是时任广东省委书记。
description.en: While Li Hongzhong was the Party Secretary of Shenzhen, Zhang Dejiang was the then Party Secretary of Guangdong Province.

description.zh-cn: 时任总理温家宝批评李鸿忠在防汛工作汇报中“信口开河”。
description.en: Then-Premier Wen Jiabao criticized Li Hongzhong for 'making irresponsible remarks' in a flood control work report.

description.zh-cn: 明治维新成功后，在大久保利通的领导下负责处理外交事务。
description.en: After the success of the Meiji Restoration, he was responsible for foreign affairs under the leadership of Ōkubo Toshimichi.

description.zh-cn: 在戊戌政变后协助康有为逃往日本。
description.en: Assisted Kang Youwei in escaping to Japan after the 1898 Coup.

description.zh-cn: 在拥立胡亥为帝后，李斯继续担任丞相。
上《谏逐客书》成功说服秦王政废除驱逐客卿的命令。
李斯因嫉妒韩非的才华，向秦王政进谗言，导致韩非下狱，并最终在狱中将其毒死。
description.en: Out of jealousy of Han Fei's talent, Li Si slandered him to King Zheng of Qin, leading to Han Fei's imprisonment and eventual death by poison in jail.

description.zh-cn: 在秦始皇死后，赵高威逼利诱李斯参与伪造遗诏的沙丘之变。
李斯与赵高合谋，伪造秦始皇遗诏，拥立胡亥为帝。
赵高与李斯合谋，伪造秦始皇遗诏，拥立胡亥为帝。
李斯与赵高合谋，伪造遗诏，以不孝罪名赐死扶苏。
赵高与李斯合谋，伪造遗诏，以不孝罪名赐死扶苏。
赵高在独揽朝政后，进谗言诬陷李斯谋反，并主导了对李斯的审判和处决。
秦二世胡亥听信赵高谗言，下令将李斯处以五刑并腰斩，诛灭三族。
为替韩国复仇，在博浪沙伏击行刺秦始皇，但未成功。
在鸿门宴事件中，通过项伯斡旋并召来樊哙，帮助刘邦化解了被项羽攻击的危机；此外，建议刘邦首先封赏其最痛恨的雍齿，以此安定群臣之心，化解了潜在的造反危机；并与陈平一同主张撕毁鸿沟条约，立即攻击项羽，最终取得楚汉相争的胜利。
设计并联合吕布诛杀了董卓。
董卓死后，率兵攻入长安，杀害了王允。
起兵追击董卓，但在荥阳被徐荣击败。
董卓掌控朝政后自封的最高官职。
李渊于晋阳起兵反隋，最终取代隋朝。

position.zh-cn: 尚书令、丞相、太原郡留守

description.zh-cn: 在起兵前，李渊曾担任隋朝的多个重要官职。

position.zh-cn: 中共中央政治局委员、中央政法委书记

description.zh-cn: 在以习近平为总书记的中共中央领导集体中担任职务。
在李克强担任总理的国务院中担任国家安全部部长。
被视为习近平的亲信之一。
梁武帝是南朝梁的开国皇帝。
description.en: Emperor Wu of Liang was the founding emperor of the Liang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 接替李鸿忠出任中共天津市委书记。
接替孙政才担任重庆市委书记。
接替陈敏尔担任重庆市委书记。
接替赵克志出任中共贵州省委书记。
陈敏尔担任贵州省省长期间，赵克志为省委书记。
陈敏尔担任浙江省委宣传部长时，张德江为省委书记。
陈敏尔任贵州省委副书记时，栗战书为省委书记。
应用心理学硕士
根据其维基百科页面分类“清华大学校友”推断。
晋升少将军衔。
袁世凯在天津小站练兵时，段祺瑞主管砲兵。
description.en: When Yuan Shikai was training the New Army at Xiaozhan, Tianjin, Duan Qirui was in charge of the artillery.

description.zh-cn: 段祺瑞联名发布《共和之电》并以武力威胁，向隆裕太后逼宫，促使其下诏清帝退位。
description.en: Duan Qirui co-signed the 'Telegram for the Republic' and used military threats to pressure Empress Dowager Longyu into issuing the abdication edict for the Qing emperor.

description.zh-cn: 冯玉祥发动甲子政变后，邀请段祺瑞出山，出任中华民国临时政府的临时执政。
description.en: After launching the Beijing Coup, Feng Yuxiang invited Duan Qirui to come out of retirement and serve as the Provisional Chief Executive of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 在武元衡遇刺案后，因白居易越职言事及被诽谤，唐宪宗将其贬为江州司马。
description.en: After the assassination of Wu Yuanheng, Emperor Xianzong demoted Bai Juyi to Sima of Jiangzhou because he overstepped his authority and was slandered.

description.zh-cn: 曾褒白居易为“诗仙”，并在其去世后作吊唁诗，评价其一生。
description.en: He praised Bai Juyi as the 'Poet Immortal' and wrote a eulogy poem after his death, summarizing his life.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡代表香港《明报》向古龙邀稿，促成了小说《绝代双骄》的诞生。
description.en: Representing Hong Kong's Ming Pao newspaper, Ni Kuang commissioned a manuscript from Gu Long, which led to the creation of the novel 'Juedai Shuangjiao'.

description.zh-cn: 金庸在自己封笔后，于1972年亲自为旗下的《明报》向古龙邀稿，促成了《陆小凤》系列的创作，此举有世代传承的意味。
description.en: After retiring from writing, Jin Yong personally invited Gu Long in 1972 to write for his newspaper Ming Pao, which led to the creation of the 'Lu Xiaofeng Series'. This act was seen as a passing of the torch between generations.

description.zh-cn: 在1980年的吟松阁事件中，因古龙不愿向柯俊雄敬酒，柯的友人叶庆辉等人用刀刺伤古龙，导致其身受重伤。
description.en: During the 1980 Yinsong Pavilion incident, Gu Long was unwilling to offer a toast to Ko Chun-hsiung. As a result, Ko's associate Ye Qinghui and others stabbed and severely injured Gu Long.

description.zh-cn: 王健林是王思聪的父亲。
description.en: Wang Jianlin is the father of Wang Sicong.

description.zh-cn: 1983年就读辽宁大学党政专修班，1986年毕业获得经济管理专业的学位。
description.en: He attended the Party and Government Cadre training class at Liaoning University from 1983, graduating in 1986 with a degree in Economic Management.

description.zh-cn: 王健林是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Wang Jianlin is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 由于冠状病毒大流行，王健林的房地产和影视事业都急剧下降，导致其财富缩水并跌出富豪榜前列。
description.en: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, Wang Jianlin's real estate and film businesses declined sharply, causing his wealth to shrink and drop him from the top ranks of the rich list.

description.zh-cn: 允禩是康熙帝的第八子。
description.en: Yinsi was the eighth son of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝即位后，将允禩革去爵位、开除宗籍、勒令改名，并将其圈禁于宗人府，允禩最终在拘禁中病故。
description.en: After ascending the throne, the Yongzheng Emperor stripped Yinsi of his titles, expelled him from the imperial clan, forced him to change his name, and imprisoned him in the Imperial Clan Court, where Yinsi eventually died.

description.zh-cn: 允禩是雍正帝的异母弟。
description.en: Yinsi was the younger half-brother of the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 在九子夺嫡期间，允禩是争夺储君之位的主要人物之一，与时为皇太子的胤礽形成政治对立。
description.en: During the nine sons' succession struggle, Yinsi was one of the main contenders for the position of crown prince, forming a political opposition to the then Crown Prince Yinreng.

description.zh-cn: 在争储后期，允禩转而支持皇十四子胤禵继承大统，二人结成政治同盟。
description.en: In the later stages of the succession struggle, Yinsi shifted his support to the 14th prince, Yinti, to inherit the throne, forming a political alliance.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆四十三年，乾隆帝下旨恢复允禩的原名，并将其及其子孙重新录入玉牒，恢复宗籍。
description.en: In 1778, the Qianlong Emperor issued an edict to restore Yinsi's original name and re-admit him and his descendants into the imperial genealogy, restoring their clan status.

description.zh-cn: 康熙三十七年，17岁的允禩受封为多罗贝勒。
description.en: In 1698, the 17-year-old Yinsi was ennobled as a Duoluo Beile.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝即位后，允禩任理藩院尚书。
description.en: After the Yongzheng Emperor's accession, Yinsi served as the Minister of the Lifan Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝即位后，命允禩与允祥、马齐、隆科多四人总理事务。
description.en: After the Yongzheng Emperor's accession, he appointed Yinsi, Yunxiang, Maci, and Longkodo to jointly manage state affairs.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来是薄一波的次子。
description.en: Bo Xilai is the second son of Bo Yibo.

description.zh-cn: 薄瓜瓜是薄熙来与妻子薄谷开来所生的幼子。
description.en: Bo Guagua is the youngest son of Bo Xilai and his wife Bo Gu Kailai.

description.zh-cn: 王立军与薄熙来决裂后，进入美国领事馆，揭露了薄家的内幕，成为薄熙来的主要政治对手。
description.en: After breaking with Bo Xilai, Wang Lijun entered the U.S. consulate and exposed the Bo family's secrets, becoming Bo's primary political adversary.

description.zh-cn: 据报道，时任总理温家宝反对薄熙来晋升为副总理，并在2012年两会记者会上公开批评重庆市委，对薄熙来的倒台起到了关键作用。
description.en: Then-Premier Wen Jiabao reportedly opposed Bo Xilai's promotion to Vice Premier and played a key role in his downfall by publicly criticizing the Chongqing Municipal Committee at a 2012 press conference.

description.zh-cn: 据报道，薄熙来在重庆发起窃听行动，其监控对象包括时任中共中央总书记胡锦涛。
description.en: Bo Xilai reportedly initiated an eavesdropping operation in Chongqing, with targets including then-General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 载沣是光绪帝（载湉）的异母弟。
description.en: Zaifeng was the younger half-brother of the Guangxu Emperor (Zaitian).

description.zh-cn: 慈禧太后在临终前发布懿旨，授载沣为摄政王，监国辅佐幼帝。
description.en: Before her death, Empress Dowager Cixi issued an edict appointing Zaifeng as the Prince-Regent to govern and assist the young emperor.

description.zh-cn: 根据慈禧太后的安排，载沣作为摄政王在遇到重大事件时，需请示隆裕太后懿旨施行。
description.en: According to Empress Dowager Cixi's arrangements, Zaifeng, as the Prince-Regent, was required to seek instructions from Empress Dowager Longyu for implementation when encountering major events.

description.zh-cn: 在袁世凯的劝说下，隆裕太后命令载沣辞去监国摄政王职位。
description.en: Persuaded by Yuan Shikai, Empress Dowager Longyu ordered Zaifeng to resign from his position as Prince-Regent.

description.zh-cn: 载沣是清朝皇族成员，并担任过军机大臣、监国摄政王等要职。
description.en: Zaifeng was a member of the Qing imperial family and held important positions such as Grand Councilor and Prince-Regent.

description.zh-cn: 作为中共一大代表，是中国共产党的创始人之一。
description.en: As a delegate to the First National Congress of the CCP, he was one of the founders of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 因张国焘投靠中国国民党而被开除党籍。
description.en: Expelled from the party after defecting to the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 在长征途中，因坚持南下和反对中共中央北上决定而与毛泽东等人产生严重分歧，并另立“中央”，导致党内分裂。1937年3月遭到毛泽东等人的批判斗争。
description.en: During the Long March, he had serious disagreements with Mao Zedong and others over his insistence on going south and opposing the Central Committee's decision to go north. He established a rival 'Central Committee', leading to a split in the party. He was criticized and struggled against by Mao Zedong and others in March 1937.

description.zh-cn: 向毛泽东报告了张国焘要求武力解决分歧的密电，促使毛泽东率领中央纵队先行北上。
description.en: Reported to Mao Zedong about Zhang Guotao's secret cable demanding a forceful resolution of their differences, which prompted Mao to lead the central column north ahead of schedule.

description.zh-cn: 秦王政十年（前237年），秦始皇下令调查并平定了嫪毐发动的叛乱，并将其诛杀。
description.en: In the tenth year of his reign (-237), Qin Shi Huang ordered an investigation and suppressed the rebellion launched by Lao Ai, subsequently having him executed.

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦于1981年加入中国共产党。
description.en: Tu Youyou joined the Communist Party of China in 1981.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院于2017年1月9日将2016年度国家最高科学技术奖授予屠呦呦。
description.en: The State Council of the People's Republic of China awarded the 2016 State Preeminent Science and Technology Award to Tu Youyou on January 9, 2017.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国主席习近平于2019年9月17日授予屠呦呦共和国勋章。
description.en: On September 17, 2019, President of the People's Republic of China Xi Jinping awarded Tu Youyou the Medal of the Republic.

description.zh-cn: 在屠呦呦获得诺贝尔奖后，时任国务院总理李克强致函表示祝贺，推动了对她的认可。
description.en: After Tu Youyou won the Nobel Prize, then-Premier Li Keqiang sent a congratulatory letter, promoting her recognition.

description.zh-cn: 微软创始人比尔·盖茨将屠呦呦获得诺贝尔奖列为“2015年6大好消息”之一，提升了其国际声誉。
description.en: Microsoft founder Bill Gates listed Tu Youyou's Nobel Prize win as one of 'The Top 6 Good-News Stories of 2015', enhancing her international reputation.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆帝是清朝的第六位皇帝，于1735年即位。1796年禅位后作为太上皇继续执政至1799年驾崩。
description.en: The Qianlong Emperor was the sixth emperor of the Qing Dynasty, ascending the throne in 1735. After abdicating in 1796, he continued to rule as Emperor Emeritus until his death in 1799.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆六十年九月三日，乾隆帝立十五子永琰（即嘉庆帝）为皇太子，并宣布次年禅让皇位。
description.en: On the third day of the ninth month of the 60th year of the Qianlong reign, the Qianlong Emperor appointed his 15th son, Yongyan (the future Jiaqing Emperor), as Crown Prince and announced his abdication for the following year.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆帝（弘历）是雍正帝的庶子。
description.en: The Qianlong Emperor (Hongli) was a son of the Yongzheng Emperor by a concubine.

description.zh-cn: 道光帝下定决心禁烟后，多次召见林则徐，并任命其为钦差大臣，前往广东主持禁烟事宜，对其高度信任和倚重。
description.en: After deciding to ban opium, the Daoguang Emperor summoned Lin Zexu multiple times and appointed him as the Imperial Commissioner to oversee the prohibition in Guangdong, placing great trust and reliance on him.

description.zh-cn: 琦善与林则徐政见长期不合，在鸦片战争期间，他与穆彰阿等人向道光帝诬告林则徐，将战争责任归咎于他，并废除了林则徐的防务政策。
description.en: Qishan had long-standing political disagreements with Lin Zexu. During the Opium War, he, along with Mujaangga and others, falsely accused Lin Zexu to the Daoguang Emperor, blaming him for the war and dismantling his defense policies.

description.zh-cn: 林则徐在新疆期间，对俄罗斯帝国的扩张保持高度警惕，并预言其将是中国的长远祸患。
description.en: During his exile in Xinjiang, Lin Zexu was highly vigilant about the expansion of the Russian Empire and predicted it would become a long-term threat to China.

description.zh-cn: 孔令俊是孔祥熙的次女。
description.en: Kong Lingjun was the second daughter of H. H. Kung.

description.zh-cn: 宋祖英于1999年加入中国共产党。
description.en: Song Zuying joined the Communist Party of China in 1999.

description.zh-cn: 宋祖英曾任第十届、十一届、十二届全国政协委员。
description.en: Song Zuying served as a member of the 10th, 11th, and 12th National Committees of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 在2011台北小巨蛋个人演唱会上与周华健同台演出。
description.en: Performed on the same stage with Wakin Chau at her 2011 solo concert at the Taipei Arena.

description.zh-cn: 孔祥熙宣布对中国银行实行管制，要求增发股票，将控制权交给政府。
description.en: H. H. Kung announced that the government would take control of the Bank of China, requiring it to issue additional shares to transfer control to the government.

description.zh-cn: 傅斯年在国民参政会上揭发孔祥熙贪污舞弊，不久后孔被免去财政部长职位。
description.en: Fu Ssu-nien exposed H. H. Kung's corruption at the People's Political Council, leading to Kung's dismissal from the post of Minister of Finance shortly thereafter.

description.zh-cn: 在明英宗被俘后，联合其他大臣拥立郕王朱祁钰为皇帝。
description.en: After Emperor Yingzong was captured, he, along with other ministers, supported the enthronement of the Prince of Cheng, Zhu Qiyu, as emperor.

description.zh-cn: 景泰帝即位后，任命于谦为兵部尚书，领导京师保卫战。
description.en: After ascending the throne, the Jingtai Emperor appointed Yu Qian as the Minister of War to lead the Defense of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 南明弘光帝为景泰帝追上庙号“代宗”和更长的谥号。
description.en: The Hongguang Emperor of the Southern Ming posthumously honored the Jingtai Emperor with the temple name 'Daizong' and a longer posthumous title.

description.zh-cn: 林立衡是林彪的女儿。
description.en: Lin Liheng is the daughter of Lin Biao.

description.zh-cn: 林立衡是叶群的女儿。
description.en: Lin Liheng is the daughter of Ye Qun.

description.zh-cn: 1962年进入清华大学电子工程系就读。
description.en: Enrolled in the Department of Electronic Engineering at Tsinghua University in 1962.

description.zh-cn: 从清华大学转学至北京大学中文系。
description.en: Transferred from Tsinghua University to the Department of Chinese at Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 在林立衡写信求助后，毛泽东于1974年7月31日批示解除了对她的审查。
description.en: After Lin Liheng wrote a letter asking for help, Mao Zedong issued an instruction on July 31, 1974, to lift the investigation against her.

description.zh-cn: 慈安太后与奕䜣、慈禧太后密谋，联合发动了辛酉政变。
description.en: Empress Dowager Ci'an conspired with Yixin and Empress Dowager Cixi to jointly launch the Xinyou Coup.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸英是杨开慧的长子。
description.en: Mao Anying is the eldest son of Yang Kaihui.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸英是毛泽东的长子。
description.en: Mao Anying is the eldest son of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸青是杨开慧的次子。
description.en: Mao Anqing is the second son of Yang Kaihui.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸青是毛泽东的次子。
description.en: Mao Anqing is the second son of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸龙是杨开慧的幼子。
description.en: Mao Anlong is the youngest son of Yang Kaihui.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸龙是毛泽东的幼子。
description.en: Mao Anlong is the youngest son of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 1928年，毛泽东在井冈山与贺子珍结婚。
description.en: In 1928, Mao Zedong married He Zizhen in the Jinggang Mountains.

description.zh-cn: 据传闻，蔡元培曾向何键发电报，要求保释杨开慧，但未成功。
description.en: According to rumors, Cai Yuanpei sent a telegram to He Jian requesting the release of Yang Kaihui, but was unsuccessful.

description.zh-cn: 苗华于1969年12月参军，2025年10月17日被开除军籍。
description.en: Miao Hua joined the army in December 1969 and was expelled from the military on October 17, 2025.

description.zh-cn: 苗华于1973年9月入党，2025年10月17日被开除党籍。
description.en: Miao Hua joined the Party in September 1973 and was expelled on October 17, 2025.

description.zh-cn: 苗华接替刘晓江，担任中国人民解放军海军政治委员。
description.en: Miao Hua succeeded Liu Xiaojiang as Political Commissar of the PLA Navy.

description.zh-cn: 正式免除苗华的中华人民共和国中央军事委员会委员职务。
description.en: Formally removed Miao Hua from his position as a member of the Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 开除苗华党籍。
description.en: Expelled Miao Hua from the party.

description.zh-cn: 开除苗华军籍。
description.en: Expelled Miao Hua from the military.

description.zh-cn: 郝明珠是习仲勋的第一任妻子，两人于1935年结婚，1944年初冬离婚。
description.en: Hao Mingzhu was Xi Zhongxun's first wife; they married in 1935 and divorced in the early winter of 1944.

description.zh-cn: 1948年8月21日，王光美与刘少奇于西柏坡结婚。
description.en: On August 21, 1948, Wang Guangmei married Liu Shaoqi in Xibaipo.

description.zh-cn: 1948年加入中国共产党。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China in 1948.

description.zh-cn: 在抗日战争胜利前夕结识了中共辅仁大学工委领导人崔月犁。
description.en: Before the victory of the Anti-Japanese War, she got to know Cui Yueli, the leader of the CCP working committee at Fu Jen University.

description.zh-cn: 外国媒体多以“第一夫人”称呼王光美，引起毛泽东夫人江青不满。
description.en: Foreign media often referred to Wang Guangmei as the 'First Lady', which caused dissatisfaction for Mao Zedong's wife, Jiang Qing.

description.zh-cn: 1966年6月，出任清华大学工作组顾问的王光美严厉打击蒯大富，在清华掀起“反蒯运动”。
description.en: In June 1966, as an advisor to the work group at Tsinghua University, Wang Guangmei severely cracked down on Kuai Dafu, launching the 'Anti-Kuai Movement' at Tsinghua.

description.zh-cn: 策划“智擒王光美”事件，将王光美扣押，并于同年4月10日组织了对她的批斗大会。
description.en: Orchestrated the 'deceitful capture of Wang Guangmei' event, detaining her, and organized a struggle session against her on April 10 of the same year.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命中与江青等人力主处死王光美。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, along with Jiang Qing and others, strongly advocated for the execution of Wang Guangmei.

description.zh-cn: 在林彪、江青等人力主处死王光美时，批示“刀下留人”，使其幸免于死。
description.en: When Lin Biao, Jiang Qing, and others strongly advocated for Wang Guangmei's execution, Mao Zedong intervened with the instruction 'spare her from the blade', saving her life.

description.zh-cn: 王光美在四清运动前期，带工作队到河北桃园大队搞试点，总结出“桃园经验”。
description.en: In the early stage of the Four Cleanups Movement, Wang Guangmei led a work team to Taoyuan Brigade in Hebei to conduct a pilot project, from which she summarized the 'Taoyuan Experience'.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命中，王光美因其的“桃园经验”而遭到造反派批斗。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Wang Guangmei was targeted and subjected to struggle sessions by rebels because of her 'Taoyuan Experience'.

description.zh-cn: 张自忠改投冯玉祥的部队，并在其麾下任职多年。
description.en: Zhang Zizhong joined Feng Yuxiang's troops and served under his command for many years.

description.zh-cn: 张自忠在宋哲元担任军长的第二十九军中任师长。
description.en: Zhang Zizhong served as a division commander in the 29th Army, which was commanded by Song Zheyuan.

description.zh-cn: 在延安各界举行的追悼大会上，毛泽东为张自忠送上“尽忠报国”的挽词。
description.en: At a memorial service held in Yan'an, Mao Zedong sent a eulogy for Zhang Zizhong with the words 'Loyally serving the country'.

description.zh-cn: 在纪念抗战胜利69周年座谈会上，习近平将张自忠列为中国人民不畏强暴、以身殉国的杰出代表。
description.en: At a symposium commemorating the 69th anniversary of the victory of the War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression, Xi Jinping listed Zhang Zizhong as an outstanding representative of the Chinese people who defied brute force and sacrificed their lives for the country.

description.zh-cn: 嘉仁于1912年7月30日继位为大正天皇。
description.en: Yoshihito succeeded to the throne as Emperor Taishō on July 30, 1912.

description.zh-cn: 大正天皇驾崩后，皇太子裕仁继位成为昭和天皇。
description.en: After the death of Emperor Taishō, Crown Prince Hirohito succeeded him as Emperor Shōwa.

description.zh-cn: 1907年，朝鲜统监伊藤博文说服当时为皇太子的嘉仁访问韩国。
description.en: In 1907, Resident-General of Korea Itō Hirobumi persuaded then-Crown Prince Yoshihito to visit Korea.

description.zh-cn: 大正天皇在位期间，日本逼迫袁世凯领导的中国北洋政府签署“二十一条”及“中日民四条约”。
description.en: During Emperor Taishō's reign, Japan forced the Beiyang Government of China, led by Yuan Shikai, to sign the 'Twenty-One Demands' and the 'Sino-Japanese Treaty of 1915'.

description.zh-cn: 允礽是康熙帝的第二子。
description.en: Yunreng was the second son of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 允礽是雍正帝（胤禛）的异母兄。
description.en: Yunreng was the elder half-brother of the Yongzheng Emperor (Yinzhen).

description.zh-cn: 册封年仅一周岁的允礽为皇太子，并亲自教导，寄予厚望。
description.en: Appointed the one-year-old Yunreng as Crown Prince, personally tutored him, and had high expectations for him.

description.zh-cn: 因允礽在康熙帝亲征噶尔丹期间患病时“侍疾无忧色”，父子情份产生裂痕。
description.en: Because Yunreng showed 'no sign of worry while attending to the sick emperor' during Kangxi's campaign against Galdan, a rift formed in their father-son relationship.

description.zh-cn: 因避雍正帝（胤禛）的名讳，允礽的名字由“胤礽”被改为“允礽”。
description.en: To avoid the naming taboo of the Yongzheng Emperor (Yinzhen), Yunreng's name was changed from 'Yinreng' to 'Yunreng'.

description.zh-cn: 在戊戌政变后，下令革职并通缉康有为。
description.en: After the Wuxu Coup, she ordered Kang Youwei to be dismissed from his post and be arrested.

description.zh-cn: 在1912年宣统退位、中华民国成立后，康有为持续反对共和制，坚持君主立宪的保皇立场。
description.en: After the abdication of the Xuantong Emperor and the establishment of the Republic of China in 1912, Kang Youwei continuously opposed the republican system, adhering to his royalist stance of constitutional monarchy.

description.zh-cn: 1966年8月，红卫兵掘开康有为墓，将其遗骸损毁。
description.en: In August 1966, Red Guards excavated Kang Youwei's tomb and destroyed his remains.

description.zh-cn: 刘永清与胡锦涛于1970年2月结婚，两人是清华大学的同班同学。
description.en: Liu Yongqing married Hu Jintao in February 1970; they were classmates at Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 胡海青是刘永清的女儿。
description.en: Hu Haiqing is the daughter of Liu Yongqing.

description.zh-cn: 胡海青是胡锦涛的女儿。
description.en: Hu Haiqing is the daughter of Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 刘永清于1959年考入清华大学水利系，1965年毕业。
description.en: Liu Yongqing was admitted to the Department of Hydraulic Engineering at Tsinghua University in 1959 and graduated in 1965.

description.zh-cn: 刘永清接替王冶坪（江泽民夫人）成为中华人民共和国第一配偶。
description.en: Liu Yongqing succeeded Wang Yeping (wife of Jiang Zemin) as the First Spouse of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 彭丽媛（习近平夫人）接替刘永清成为中华人民共和国第一配偶。
description.en: Peng Liyuan (wife of Xi Jinping) succeeded Liu Yongqing as the First Spouse of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 常芝青是刘永清的舅舅。
description.en: Chang Zhiging is Liu Yongqing's maternal uncle.

description.zh-cn: 1998年6月25日，刘永清以胡锦涛夫人身份首次亮相，迎接时任美国总统比尔·克林顿。
description.en: On June 25, 1998, Liu Yongqing made her first public appearance as Hu Jintao's wife to welcome then-U.S. President Bill Clinton.

description.zh-cn: 刘鹤是第十九届中共中央政治局委员。
description.en: Liu He was a member of the 19th Politburo of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 与何卫东一同担任中共中央军事委员会副主席和中华人民共和国中央军事委员会副主席。
description.en: Has been serving alongside He Weidong as Vice Chairman of the CCP Central Military Commission and the PRC Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 张又侠接替常万全出任中国人民解放军总装备部部长。
description.en: Zhang Youxia succeeded Chang Wanquan as Minister of the PLA General Armament Department.

description.zh-cn: 习近平在2002年至2007年任中共浙江省委书记期间，黄坤明先后主政湖州、嘉兴，是其下属。黄坤明被认为是习近平的重要亲信之一。
description.en: While Xi Jinping was the Party Secretary of Zhejiang from 2002 to 2007, Huang Kunming served as the head of Huzhou and Jiaxing, making him a subordinate. Huang is considered a key confidant of Xi.

description.zh-cn: 习近平出任中共中央总书记后不久，将黄坤明上调至中共中央宣传部任职。
description.en: Shortly after Xi Jinping became General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, he promoted Huang Kunming to a position in the Central Propaganda Department.

description.zh-cn: 1999年，黄坤明与时任三明市市长蔡奇一同被调往浙江省任职。
description.en: In 1999, Huang Kunming, along with Cai Qi, who was then the mayor of Sanming, were both transferred to Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 1988年至1993年就读于清华大学热能工程系空调专业。
description.en: Studied in the Air Conditioning major of the Department of Thermal Engineering at Tsinghua University from 1988 to 1993.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛曾坚决反对女儿胡海清出国留学，并在其擅自前往比利时后，勒令其回国。
description.en: Hu Jintao strongly opposed his daughter Hu Haiqing's plan to study abroad and ordered her to return to China after she went to Belgium without his permission.

description.zh-cn: 移居美国后，胡海清与丈夫茅道临拒绝了父亲胡锦涛多次要求他们回国的请求。
description.en: After moving to the United States, Hu Haiqing and her husband Mao Daolin refused her father Hu Jintao's repeated requests for them to return to China.

description.zh-cn: 梁思成与林徽因于1928年结婚，直至1955年林徽因逝世。
description.en: Liang Sicheng married Lin Huiyin in 1928, and they remained married until her death in 1955.

position.en: Head of the Department of Architecture at Northeastern University

description.zh-cn: 梁思成在东北大学任教时，张学良时任该校校长。
description.en: When Liang Sicheng taught at Northeastern University, Zhang Xueliang was the president of the university.

position.zh-cn: 晋军军官、第二战区北路军总司令
position.en: Jin Army Officer, Commander of the Northern Route Army of the Second War Area

description.zh-cn: 傅作义毕业后加入阎锡山领导的晋军，长期在其麾下任职，直至1938年12月出任第八战区副司令长官后摆脱其控制。
description.en: After graduation, Fu Zuoyi joined the Jin Army led by Yan Xishan and served under him for a long time, until he broke free from his control after being appointed Deputy Commander of the Eighth War Area in December 1938.

description.zh-cn: 傅冬是傅作义的长女。
description.en: Fu Dong is Fu Zuoyi's eldest daughter.

description.zh-cn: 傅冬作为中共地下党员，在其父傅作义身边工作，不断进行劝说，为促成北平和平解放起了重要作用。
description.en: As an underground member of the CCP, Fu Dong worked alongside her father Fu Zuoyi and continuously persuaded him, playing a crucial role in bringing about the peaceful liberation of Beiping.

position.zh-cn: 水利部/水利电力部部长
position.en: Minister of Water Resources / Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，傅作义长期担任水利部及后来的水利电力部部长，是时任国务院总理周恩来的下属。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, Fu Zuoyi served for a long time as the Minister of Water Resources and later the Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power, subordinate to then-Premier Zhou Enlai.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命爆发之初，周恩来将傅作义列入应予保护的干部名单中，对其进行保护。
description.en: At the beginning of the Cultural Revolution, Zhou Enlai included Fu Zuoyi in a list of cadres to be protected, thereby protecting him.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次国共内战期间，傅作义作为国民党高级将领，与毛泽东领导的共产党军队为敌，并曾发表致毛泽东的公开电进行谴责。
description.en: During the Second Chinese Civil War, Fu Zuoyi, as a high-ranking Nationalist general, was an enemy of the Communist forces led by Mao Zedong and once issued a public telegram condemning him.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文是孔祥熙的妻弟。
description.en: T. V. Soong was H. H. Kung's brother-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 1915年于哈佛大学经济学毕业。
description.en: Graduated from Harvard University with a degree in economics in 1915.

description.zh-cn: 在哥伦比亚大学研究所就读。
description.en: Attended graduate school at Columbia University.

description.zh-cn: 1935年4月起，宋子文接任中国银行董事长。
description.en: From April 1935, T. V. Soong took over as the Chairman of the Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文与张学良是好友，曾在西安事变中出面调解。
description.en: T. V. Soong and Zhang Xueliang were friends, and Soong mediated during the Xi'an Incident.

description.zh-cn: 1945年，宋子文赴苏联同斯大林会谈，并签订《中苏友好同盟条约》。
description.en: In 1945, T. V. Soong went to the Soviet Union to meet with Stalin and sign the Sino-Soviet Treaty of Friendship and Alliance.

description.zh-cn: 据称杜鲁门曾大骂宋家为“贼”，但此说法的真实性存疑。
description.en: Truman allegedly called the Soong family 'thieves,' although the authenticity of this claim is disputed.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文是宋氏家族的核心成员之一。
description.en: T. V. Soong was one of the core members of the Soong family.

description.zh-cn: 太平公主是武则天的女儿。
description.en: Princess Taiping was the daughter of Wu Zetian.

description.zh-cn: 太平公主是李弘的妹妹。
description.en: Princess Taiping was the younger sister of Li Hong.

description.zh-cn: 安乐公主曾试图诬陷太平公主，两人敌对关系明显白热化。
description.en: Princess Anle once attempted to frame Princess Taiping, and their adversarial relationship became overtly intense.

description.zh-cn: 太平公主与上官婉儿一同草拟中宗遗诏，在上官婉儿被杀后，太平公主十分哀伤，并出资厚葬及搜集其文集。
description.en: Princess Taiping and Shangguan Wan'er jointly drafted Emperor Zhongzong's final edict. After Shangguan Wan'er's execution, Princess Taiping was deeply saddened, funded her grand burial, and collected her literary works.

description.zh-cn: 在七国之乱爆发后，汉景帝为平息叛乱，采纳袁盎等人的建议，将晁错腰斩于东市。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Rebellion of the Seven States, Emperor Jing, in an attempt to quell the rebellion, adopted the advice of Yuan Ang and others and had Chao Cuo executed by waist-chop at the East Market.

description.zh-cn: 栗姬是汉景帝的妃嫔。
description.en: Consort Li was a consort of Emperor Jing.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝刘彻是汉景帝的儿子。
description.en: Emperor Wu (Liu Che) was the son of Emperor Jing.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝刘彻的生母是汉景帝的王皇后。
description.en: The birth mother of Emperor Wu (Liu Che) was Empress Wang of Emperor Jing.

description.zh-cn: 前150年四月，汉景帝立王氏为皇后。
description.en: In the fourth month of 150 BCE, Emperor Jing installed Lady Wang as Empress.

description.zh-cn: 晁错在汉景帝时期担任御史大夫。
description.en: Chao Cuo served as Grandee Secretary during the reign of Emperor Jing.

description.zh-cn: 孙权是孙策的二弟。
description.en: Sun Quan is Sun Ce's younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 孙策在父亲孙坚死后，为讨回旧部曾一度在袁术麾下效力。
description.en: After his father Sun Jian's death, Sun Ce briefly served under Yuan Shu to reclaim his father's former troops.

description.zh-cn: 袁术僭越称帝后，孙策与其断绝关系，并参与了对袁术的讨伐。
description.en: After Yuan Shu declared himself emperor, Sun Ce broke ties with him and participated in the campaign against him.

position.en: General Who Attacks Rebels, Marquis of Wu

description.zh-cn: 因孙策讨伐袁术有功，曹操表奏朝廷授予孙策讨逆将军官职并加封为吴侯。
description.en: Due to Sun Ce's merits in the campaign against Yuan Shu, Cao Cao petitioned the court to grant Sun Ce the title of 'General Who Attacks Rebels' and ennoble him as the Marquis of Wu.

description.zh-cn: 太史慈原为刘繇部下，在神亭岭与孙策交战。后被孙策俘获，孙策亲自为其松绑并委以重任，太史慈遂归顺。
description.en: Tai Shi Ci initially served Liu Yao and fought Sun Ce at Shenting Ridge. He was later captured by Sun Ce, who personally untied him and entrusted him with important tasks, leading to Tai Shi Ci's allegiance.

description.zh-cn: 孙权称帝后，追谥其兄孙策为长沙桓王。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Sun Quan posthumously honored his elder brother Sun Ce as Prince Huan of Changsha.

description.zh-cn: 宋教仁与黄兴、刘揆一、陈天华、章士钊等人共同成立华兴会。
description.en: Song Jiaoren co-founded the Huaxinghui with Huang Xing, Liu Kuiyi, Chen Tianhua, Zhang Shizhao, and others.

description.zh-cn: 在华兴会中，宋教仁担任副会长，会长为黄兴。
description.en: In the Huaxinghui, Song Jiaoren served as Vice President under President Huang Xing.

description.zh-cn: 1903年8月，宋教仁与黄兴在武昌相识，从此成为挚友。
description.en: In August 1903, Song Jiaoren and Huang Xing met in Wuchang and became close friends thereafter.

description.zh-cn: 宋教仁倡导的责任内阁制威胁到袁世凯的统治地位。时人普遍认为，袁世凯授意或幕后策划了对国民党领袖宋教仁的暗杀，以阻止其组阁。
description.en: The cabinet responsibility system advocated by Song Jiaoren threatened Yuan Shikai's ruling position. It was widely believed at the time that Yuan Shikai ordered or masterminded the assassination of Kuomintang leader Song Jiaoren to prevent him from forming a cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 在公开斥责袁世凯刺宋后，林述庆在袁世凯秘书长梁士诒的宴席上被毒死。
description.en: After publicly denouncing Yuan Shikai for assassinating Song, Lin Shuqing was poisoned at a banquet hosted by Yuan's chief secretary Liang Shiyi.

description.zh-cn: 倪亦方是亦舒的胞兄。
description.en: Ni Yifang is Yi Shu's elder brother.

description.zh-cn: 倪震是亦舒的侄子。
description.en: Joe Nieh is Yi Shu's nephew.

description.zh-cn: 周慧敏是亦舒的侄媳。
description.en: Vivian Chow is Yi Shu's niece-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 于1993年移民加拿大。
description.en: Immigrated to Canada in 1993.

description.zh-cn: 亦舒的科幻作品不时会看到兄长倪匡作品的角色客串出现。
description.en: Characters from her elder brother Ni Kuang's works occasionally make guest appearances in Yi Shu's science fiction works.

description.zh-cn: 袁定阳是袁隆平的三子。
description.en: Yuan Dingyang is Yuan Longping's third son.

description.zh-cn: 国家科委在读到袁隆平的论文后，发公函责成湖南省科委将其列为“保护对象”并支持其研究。
description.en: After reading Yuan Longping's paper, the State Science and Technology Commission issued an official letter instructing the Hunan Provincial Science and Technology Commission to designate him as a "protected individual" and support his research.

description.zh-cn: 在第一次和第二次鸦片战争中，清朝与大英帝国是主要交战方。
description.en: The Qing dynasty and the British Empire were the main belligerents in the First and Second Opium Wars.

description.zh-cn: 在中共早期，斯大林不信任毛泽东，支持“二十八个半布尔什维克”等苏联路线的领导人，并将毛泽东排除在中央委员会之外。
description.en: In the early days of the CCP, Stalin distrusted Mao Zedong, supported leaders who followed the Soviet line, such as the "28 Bolsheviks," and excluded Mao from the Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中共保守派将学潮的爆发归咎于胡耀邦对资产阶级自由化的纵容，并向邓小平等核心领导人施压，最终促使其下台。
description.en: CCP conservatives blamed the outbreak of the student movement on Hu Yaobang's tolerance of bourgeois liberalization and pressured paramount leader Deng Xiaoping and others, ultimately leading to his ousting.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在与胡耀邦等人的谈话中严厉批评其应对学潮不力，并主持了决定胡耀邦辞职的中央政治局扩大会议，起到了决定性作用。
description.en: In a talk with Hu Yaobang and others, Deng Xiaoping severely criticized his ineffective response to the student unrest and presided over the enlarged Politburo meeting that decided Hu's resignation, playing a decisive role.

description.zh-cn: 在1987年1月16日的中共中央政治局扩大会议上，胡耀邦辞去中共中央总书记职务。
description.en: At the enlarged meeting of the CCP Politburo on January 16, 1987, Hu Yaobang resigned from his position as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦辞职后，赵紫阳被一致推选为代理中共中央总书记。
description.en: Following Hu Yaobang's resignation, Zhao Ziyang was unanimously elected as the acting General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.

position.zh-cn: 中共中央总书记、中共中央军委主席
position.en: General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, Chairman of the CPC Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 在中共十八大上，习近平接替胡锦涛，成为中国共产党的主要领导人。
description.en: At the 18th CPC National Congress, Xi Jinping succeeded Hu Jintao to become the primary leader of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 《朴茨茅斯条约》的签订标志着日俄战争的正式结束。
description.en: The signing of the Treaty of Portsmouth marked the official end of the Russo-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 作为中间人斡旋日俄双方进行停战谈判并达成协议。
description.en: Acted as a mediator to facilitate peace negotiations between Japan and Russia, leading to the agreement.

description.zh-cn: 担任日俄战争时期俄罗斯帝国的国家元首和最高统帅。
description.en: Served as the head of state and commander-in-chief of the Russian Empire during the Russo-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 据路透社报道，在执行宽松防疫措施后，习近平希望放缓开放，但李强反驳了习近平的要求，并继续推动放宽政策。
description.en: According to Reuters, after implementing relaxed epidemic measures, Xi Jinping wished to slow down the reopening, but Li Qiang rebutted his request and continued to push for policy relaxation.

description.zh-cn: 据媒体人士王向伟透露，时任中共广东省委书记黄坤明曾向习近平反映尽快结束清零政策的紧迫性，间接推动了政策终结。
description.en: According to media personality Wang Xiangwei, Huang Kunming, then Party Secretary of Guangdong, reported to Xi Jinping on the urgency of ending the zero-COVID policy, indirectly contributing to its termination.

description.zh-cn: 事件后，邓小平被错误地认定为幕后总指挥，导致其被撤销党内外一切职务。
事件后，中共中央政治局通过决议，任命华国锋为中共中央第一副主席和国务院总理，巩固了其作为毛泽东接班人的地位。
中共中央政治局将事件定性为“反革命政治事件”，并出动民兵、公安和卫戍部队进行暴力镇压。
陈云在中央工作会议上率先提出为天安门事件平反，对最终平反起到了关键的推动作用。
作为毛泽东的联络员，毛远新向毛泽东汇报天安门广场的情况，并传达其指示。
在罗瑞卿事件中，罗瑞卿被指责为“反对突出政治”、“反对林彪”，随后被调离军事工作领导岗位并受到批判。
description.en: In the Luo Ruiqing Incident, Luo was accused of 'opposing the prominence of politics' and 'opposing Lin Biao,' and was subsequently removed from his military leadership position and criticized.

description.zh-cn: 中央军委内部日渐分裂，林彪与罗瑞卿分属不同派别，最终在1965年12月的上海会议上，林彪等人对罗瑞卿进行突然袭击，导致罗瑞卿事件。
description.en: The Central Military Commission gradually split, with Lin Biao and Luo Ruiqing in opposing factions. This culminated in the Shanghai Conference of December 1965, where Lin Biao and others launched a surprise attack on Luo Ruiqing, leading to the Luo Ruiqing Incident.

description.zh-cn: 在1965年12月的上海会议上，叶群与林彪等人一同对罗瑞卿进行突然袭击，导致罗瑞卿事件。
description.en: At the Shanghai Conference in December 1965, Ye Qun, along with Lin Biao and others, launched a surprise attack on Luo Ruiqing, leading to the Luo Ruiqing Incident.

description.zh-cn: 在罗瑞卿事件前，中央军委内部分裂为两派，叶剑英与林彪等人为一派，与贺龙、罗瑞卿一派对立。
description.en: Before the Luo Ruiqing Incident, the Central Military Commission was split into two factions, with Ye Jianying, Lin Biao, and others in one faction opposing the faction led by He Long and Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 在罗瑞卿事件前，中央军委内部分裂为两派，聂荣臻与林彪等人为一派，与贺龙、罗瑞卿一派对立。
description.en: Before the Luo Ruiqing Incident, the Central Military Commission was split into two factions, with Nie Rongzhen, Lin Biao, and others in one faction opposing the faction led by He Long and Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东首肯了林彪等人对罗瑞卿的攻击，导致罗瑞卿事件的发生。
description.en: Mao Zedong approved the attack on Luo Ruiqing by Lin Biao and others, which led to the Luo Ruiqing Incident.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东表示其是“听了林彪一面之辞，错整了罗瑞卿”，为罗瑞卿的平反奠定了基础。
description.en: Mao Zedong stated that he had 'wrongly purged Luo Ruiqing based on Lin Biao's one-sided account,' laying the groundwork for Luo's rehabilitation.

description.zh-cn: 刘少奇主持召开中共中央政治局扩大会议，批判“彭真、罗瑞卿、陆定一、杨尚昆的‘反党错误’”，并决定停止和撤销罗瑞卿的全部职务。
description.en: Liu Shaoqi presided over an enlarged meeting of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, criticizing the 'anti-Party errors' of Peng Zhen, Luo Ruiqing, Lu Dingyi, and Yang Shangkun, and decided to suspend and dismiss Luo Ruiqing from all his posts.

description.zh-cn: 刘少奇主持召开中共中央政治局扩大会议，批判“彭真、罗瑞卿、陆定一、杨尚昆的‘反党错误’”。
description.en: Liu Shaoqi presided over an enlarged meeting of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, criticizing the 'anti-Party errors' of Peng Zhen, Luo Ruiqing, Lu Dingyi, and Yang Shangkun.

description.zh-cn: “文化大革命”结束后，罗瑞卿在政治上得到平反。
description.en: After the Cultural Revolution ended, Luo Ruiqing was politically rehabilitated.

description.zh-cn: 罗瑞卿逝世后，邓小平前往机场迎灵，并于8月12日的追悼会上致悼词。
description.en: After Luo Ruiqing's death, Deng Xiaoping went to the airport to receive his remains and delivered the eulogy at the memorial service on August 12.

description.zh-cn: 因叶剑英就罗瑞卿跳楼一事作诗表达同情，周恩来严厉批判其“完全站到罗瑞卿一边”。
description.en: Because Ye Jianying wrote a poem expressing sympathy for Luo Ruiqing's suicide attempt, Zhou Enlai severely criticized him for 'completely siding with Luo Ruiqing'.

description.zh-cn: 乔治·沃克·布什是第41任美国总统乔治·赫伯特·沃克·布什的儿子。
description.en: George W. Bush is the son of the 41st U.S. President, George H. W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 乔治·沃克·布什是芭芭拉·布什的儿子。
description.en: George W. Bush is the son of Barbara Bush.

description.zh-cn: 乔治·沃克·布什于1975年获得哈佛大学工商管理硕士学位。
description.en: George W. Bush earned a Master of Business Administration degree from Harvard University in 1975.

description.zh-cn: 乔治·沃克·布什于2001年至2009年间担任第43任美国总统。
description.en: George W. Bush served as the 43rd President of the United States from 2001 to 2009.

description.zh-cn: 乔治·沃克·布什接替比尔·克林顿成为美国总统。
description.en: George W. Bush succeeded Bill Clinton as President of the United States.

position.en: Vice President of the United States

description.zh-cn: 迪克·切尼在乔治·沃克·布什的总统任期内担任副总统。
description.en: Dick Cheney served as Vice President during George W. Bush's presidency.

description.zh-cn: 乔治·沃克·布什于2003年3月发动了伊拉克战争。
description.en: George W. Bush launched the Iraq War in March 2003.

description.zh-cn: 2001年，乔治·沃克·布什主导帮助中国大陆进入世界贸易组织。
description.en: In 2001, George W. Bush led efforts to facilitate Mainland China's entry into the World Trade Organization.

description.zh-cn: 在2004年美国总统选举中，乔治·沃克·布什击败了民主党参选人约翰·克里，成功连任。
description.en: George W. Bush defeated Democratic candidate John Kerry in the 2004 United States presidential election to win re-election.

description.zh-cn: 罗伯特·盖茨在布什总统任内接替拉姆斯菲尔德担任国防部长。
description.en: Robert Gates succeeded Donald Rumsfeld as Secretary of Defense under President Bush.

description.zh-cn: 2006年4月20日，布什总统与时任中国国家主席胡锦涛在白宫会面。
description.en: On April 20, 2006, President Bush met with then-Chinese President Hu Jintao at the White House.

description.zh-cn: 1983年6月10日，国家副主席候选人廖承志因突发心脏病逝世。
description.en: On June 10, 1983, Liao Chengzhi, a candidate for Vice President, died of a sudden heart attack.

description.zh-cn: 因李景隆举止雍容华贵而多次瞩目于他。
在靖难之役中，作为建文帝的大将军，与燕王朱棣为敌对关系，并屡次败于朱棣。
与谷王朱橞开金川门投降，归顺燕王朱棣。
永乐二年，在群臣弹劾下，朱棣下诏削去李景隆的爵位并将其合家软禁。
在燕军渡江后，请求建文帝诛杀李景隆。

position.zh-cn: 首相经济和金融高级顾问
position.en: Senior Advisor on Economics and Finance to the Prime Minister

description.zh-cn: 安华委任其女儿努鲁依莎为首相经济和金融高级顾问。
description.en: Anwar appointed his daughter Nurul Izzah as Senior Advisor on Economics and Finance to the Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 1982年，时任首相马哈迪·莫哈末邀请安华加入执政党巫统，开启了安华的政府官职生涯。
description.en: In 1982, then-Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad invited Anwar to join the ruling party UMNO, launching Anwar's career in government.

description.zh-cn: 1998年9月2日，首相马哈迪·莫哈末革除了安华的副首相兼财政部长职位。
description.en: On September 2, 1998, Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad dismissed Anwar from his positions as Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance.

description.zh-cn: 宋任穷是宋彬彬的父亲。
description.en: Song Renqiong is Song Binbin's father.

description.zh-cn: 在天安门城楼上为毛泽东佩戴红卫兵袖章，并被毛泽东建议改名为“要武”。
description.en: On the Tiananmen Rostrum, she put a Red Guard armband on Mao Zedong, who then suggested she change her name to 'Yaowu'.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在天安门城楼接见宋彬彬，并为其建议名字“要武”，此举使宋彬彬闻名全国，推动了她的红卫兵领袖地位。
description.en: Mao Zedong received Song Binbin on the Tiananmen Rostrum and suggested the name 'Yaowu' for her. This act made her nationally famous and promoted her status as a Red Guard leader.

description.zh-cn: 在一次大会上点名批评宋任穷，导致宋家失势。
description.en: Publicly criticized Song Renqiong at a large meeting, leading to the Song family's downfall.

description.zh-cn: 批评宋彬彬去武汉保湖北省委的行为，导致宋彬彬和其母亲被软禁于沈阳。
description.en: Criticized Song Binbin for going to Wuhan to support the Hubei Provincial Party Committee, which led to Song Binbin and her mother being placed under house arrest in Shenyang.

description.zh-cn: 徐榛蔚是傅兆林的儿媳。
description.en: Hsu Chen-wei is Fu Zhaolin's daughter-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 出席傅兆林告别式并致哀。
description.en: Attended Fu Zhaolin's funeral to pay respects.

description.zh-cn: 出席傅兆林告别式并致哀。
description.en: Attended Fu Zhaolin's funeral to pay respects.

description.zh-cn: 袁崇焕在宁远之战和宁锦之战中，两次成功指挥明军击败后金的进攻。
description.en: Yuan Chonghuan successfully commanded the Ming forces to defeat the Later Jin invasions twice, in the Battle of Ningyuan and the Battle of Ningjin.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆皇帝下诏为袁崇焕平反，肯定他“尚能忠于所事”，认为其罹难是因“主暗政昏”，深表悯恻。
description.en: The Qianlong Emperor issued an edict posthumously rehabilitating Yuan Chonghuan, affirming that he was 'loyal to his duty' and attributing his tragic fate to a 'dim-witted and muddle-headed ruler,' expressing deep sympathy.

description.zh-cn: 宁锦之战后，魏忠贤党羽以袁崇焕不救锦州为由进行弹劾，导致袁崇焕被迫请求辞官归乡。
description.en: After the Battle of Ningjin, allies of Wei Zhongxian impeached Yuan Chonghuan on the grounds of failing to relieve Jinzhou, forcing Yuan to request retirement from his post.

description.zh-cn: 在位期间，明熹宗采纳朝臣建议，提拔袁崇焕至兵部任职，并在宁远之战后多次予以升迁和嘉奖，支持其在辽东的军事活动。
description.en: During his reign, the Tianqi Emperor adopted the advice of his officials to promote Yuan Chonghuan to a position in the Ministry of War. Following the Battle of Ningyuan, he repeatedly promoted and rewarded Yuan, supporting his military activities in Liaodong.

position.zh-cn: 普鲁士王国首相, 北德意志邦联首相, 德意志帝国首相
position.en: Minister President of Prussia, Chancellor of the North German Confederation, Chancellor of the German Empire

description.zh-cn: 奥托·冯·俾斯麦长期担任普鲁士及统一后的德国的政府首脑。
description.en: Otto von Bismarck served for a long time as the head of government of Prussia and later the unified Germany.

description.zh-cn: 在威廉一世担任普鲁士国王和德意志皇帝期间，被其任命为首相，两人形成了十分特别的牢固关系。
description.en: During Wilhelm I's reign as King of Prussia and German Emperor, Bismarck was appointed as his Minister President, and the two formed a particularly strong bond.

description.zh-cn: 在威廉二世执政初期担任首相，后因分歧被其解职。
description.en: Served as Chancellor during the early years of Wilhelm II's reign, but was later dismissed due to disagreements.

description.zh-cn: 因政策分歧和权力斗争，年少气盛的威廉二世解除了俾斯麦的首相职务，迫使其下野。
description.en: Due to policy disagreements and power struggles, the young and ambitious Wilhelm II dismissed Bismarck from his position as Chancellor, forcing him into retirement.

description.zh-cn: 为将奥地利排除出德意志邦联，通过外交手段孤立奥地利后，策划并发动了普奥战争。
description.en: To exclude Austria from the German Confederation, he diplomatically isolated Austria and then planned and initiated the Austro-Prussian War.

description.zh-cn: 为孤立法国，与奥匈帝国、俄罗斯帝国缔结“三帝同盟”。
description.en: To isolate France, he formed the 'League of the Three Emperors' with Austria-Hungary and the Russian Empire.

description.zh-cn: 1879年从普林斯顿大学毕业。
description.en: Graduated from Princeton University in 1879.

degree.zh-cn: 历史与政治科学哲学博士
degree.en: Ph.D. in History and Political Science

description.zh-cn: 1886年从约翰·霍普金斯大学获得历史与政治科学的哲学博士学位。
description.en: Received a Ph.D. in History and Political Science from Johns Hopkins University in 1886.

description.zh-cn: 担任普林斯顿大学第13任校长。
description.en: Served as the 13th President of Princeton University.

description.zh-cn: 担任第28任美国总统。
description.en: Served as the 28th President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 伍德罗·威尔逊是民主党成员，并作为其候选人当选新泽西州州长和美国总统。
description.en: Woodrow Wilson was a member of the Democratic Party and was elected Governor of New Jersey and President of the United States as its candidate.

description.zh-cn: 威尔逊于1917年4月2日请求国会宣战，将美国带入第一次世界大战。
description.en: Wilson asked Congress for a declaration of war on April 2, 1917, bringing the United States into World War I.

description.zh-cn: 威尔逊总统于1913年签署了《联邦储备法案》，从而建立了联邦储备系统。
description.en: President Wilson signed the Federal Reserve Act in 1913, establishing the Federal Reserve System.

description.zh-cn: 威尔逊政府在多个联邦政府机构内实施了种族隔离政策，导致大量黑人雇员被解职或隔离。
description.en: The Wilson administration introduced racial segregation in several federal government agencies, leading to the dismissal or segregation of many black employees.

description.zh-cn: 作为美国总统，威尔逊在1919年巴黎和会上与法国总理乔治·克列孟梭进行谈判。
description.en: As President of the United States, Wilson negotiated with French Prime Minister Georges Clemenceau at the Paris Peace Conference in 1919.

description.zh-cn: 韩非与李斯一同拜荀子为师，为同学关系。
description.en: Han Fei and Li Si studied under Xunzi together as fellow students.

description.zh-cn: 秦王政在读到韩非的著作后对其极为欣赏，感叹“寡人假如能够见到这个作者并与他往来，就死而无憾了”。
description.en: After reading Han Fei's works, King Zheng of Qin deeply admired him, remarking, 'If I could but meet this man and befriend him, I would die without regret.'

description.zh-cn: 韩非的思想受商鞅影响。
description.en: Han Fei's thought was influenced by Shang Yang.

description.zh-cn: 韩非的思想受慎到影响。
description.en: Han Fei's thought was influenced by Shen Dao.

description.zh-cn: 韩非的思想受老子影响，并对《道德经》有深入研究。
description.en: Han Fei's thought was influenced by Laozi, and he conducted in-depth research on the Tao Te Ching.

description.zh-cn: 韩非反对儒家建构在私人情感与社会道德提升上的治国主张。
description.en: Han Fei opposed the Confucian approach to governance, which was based on personal emotional bonds and the elevation of social morality.

description.zh-cn: 韩非是《韩非子》的作者。
description.en: Han Fei is the author of the Han Feizi.

description.zh-cn: 《韩非子》一书传到秦国，其内容促使秦王政以战争为要挟，逼迫韩非出使秦国。
description.en: The book Han Feizi reached the state of Qin, and its contents prompted King Zheng of Qin to use the threat of war to compel Han Fei to be sent as an envoy to Qin.

description.zh-cn: 韩非曾与堂谿公谈话。
description.en: Han Fei once had a conversation with Tang Xi Gong.

description.zh-cn: 吴仪于1997年至2002年任中共中央政治局候补委员，2002年至2007年任委员。
description.en: Wu Yi served as an alternate member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee from 1997 to 2002, and as a full member from 2002 to 2007.

position.en: Vice Premier of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 在温家宝担任国务院总理的内阁中，吴仪出任国务院副总理。
description.en: In the cabinet where Wen Jiabao served as Premier of the State Council, Wu Yi was appointed Vice Premier.

description.zh-cn: 在朱镕基担任国务院总理期间，吴仪是国务委员。
description.en: While Zhu Rongji was Premier of the State Council, Wu Yi served as a State Councilor.

description.zh-cn: 在胡锦涛担任中共中央总书记期间，吴仪是中央政治局委员。
description.en: While Hu Jintao was General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, Wu Yi was a member of the Politburo.

description.zh-cn: 因小泉纯一郎等日本高官在二战历史问题上发出强硬表态，吴仪在访日期间断然决定取消与小泉的会面。
description.en: Due to strong statements from Japanese high officials including Junichiro Koizumi on WWII history issues, Wu Yi decisively canceled her meeting with Koizumi during her visit to Japan.

description.zh-cn: 2007年初，时任副总理的黄菊病重，吴仪全面接管了中国的经济和金融工作。
description.en: In early 2007, as then Vice Premier Huang Ju was critically ill, Wu Yi took full charge of China's economic and financial affairs.

description.zh-cn: 吴仪卸任排名第一的国务院副总理后，由李克强接任。
description.en: After Wu Yi stepped down as the first-ranking Vice Premier of the State Council, she was succeeded by Li Keqiang.

description.zh-cn: 吴仪接替李岚清，出任中华人民共和国对外贸易经济合作部部长。
description.en: Wu Yi succeeded Li Lanqing as the Minister of Foreign Trade and Economic Cooperation of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 会议确立了邓小平的领导地位，华国锋的权力被削弱并开始淡出权力核心。
description.en: The plenum established Deng Xiaoping's leadership, weakening Hua Guofeng's power and beginning his fade from the core of power.

description.zh-cn: 在巴基斯坦，因为受到伊斯兰教的征服和同化，种姓制度的影响力相对印度被弱化。
description.en: In Pakistan, due to the conquest and assimilation by Islam, the influence of the caste system was weakened compared to India.

description.zh-cn: 根据改革决定，自2018年1月1日起，武警部队由中共中央、中央军委集中统一领导，归中央军委建制。
description.en: According to the reform decision, from January 1, 2018, the People's Armed Police force is under the centralized and unified leadership of the CPC Central Committee and the Central Military Commission, and is placed under the command of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛于1988年12月1日起担任中共西藏自治区党委书记，是骚乱期间当地的最高负责人。
description.en: Hu Jintao served as the Party Secretary of the Tibet Autonomous Region Committee of the CPC starting December 1, 1988, making him the highest official in the region during the unrest.

description.zh-cn: 林彪时任第115师师长。
description.en: Lin Biao was the commander of the 115th Division at the time.

description.zh-cn: 东条英机在平型关战役初期担任察哈尔派遣兵团司令官，后由笠原幸雄接任。
description.en: Hideki Tojo served as the commander of the Chahar Expeditionary Force at the beginning of the Battle of Pingxingguan and was later succeeded by Yukio Kasahara.

description.zh-cn: 在长沙与周恩来共同审定并最终确定了被称为“长沙决策”的人事安排方案。
description.en: Jointly reviewed and finalized the personnel arrangement plan known as the 'Changsha Decision' with Zhou Enlai in Changsha.

description.zh-cn: 前往长沙向毛泽东汇报四届人大准备情况，并共同确定了“长沙决策”。
description.en: Traveled to Changsha to report to Mao Zedong on the preparations for the 4th National People's Congress and jointly finalized the 'Changsha Decision'.

description.zh-cn: 在王洪文告状后，批评了王洪文。
description.en: Criticized Wang Hongwen after Wang made accusations.

description.zh-cn: 致信江青，告诫其“不要多露面，不要批文件，不要由你组阁（当后台老板）”。
description.en: Sent a letter to Jiang Qing, warning her 'not to make too many public appearances, not to approve documents, and not to form a cabinet (be the boss behind the scenes)'.

description.zh-cn: 1974年12月23日，周恩来向毛泽东汇报四届人大准备情况。12月26日晚，两人单独长谈，最终确定了“长沙决策”。
description.en: On December 23, 1974, Zhou Enlai reported to Mao Zedong on the preparations for the 4th NPC. On the evening of December 26, the two had a long private talk and finalized the 'Changsha Decision'.

description.zh-cn: 1974年10月，王洪文前往长沙向毛泽东告状。12月23日，与周恩来一同向毛泽东汇报工作。
description.en: In October 1974, Wang Hongwen went to Changsha to complain to Mao Zedong. On December 23, he, along with Zhou Enlai, reported to Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 与王洪文一同前往长沙向毛泽东汇报四届人大准备情况。
description.en: Traveled to Changsha together with Wang Hongwen to report to Mao Zedong on the preparations for the 4th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 《开罗宣言》声明盟国将坚持对日作战直至其无条件投降，并要求日本归还其所窃取的一切领土。
description.en: The Cairo Declaration stated that the Allied powers would persevere in the war against Japan until its unconditional surrender and demanded that Japan return all territories it had stolen.

description.zh-cn: 《开罗宣言》决定在相当时期内，使朝鲜获得自由与独立。
description.en: The Cairo Declaration decided that in due course Korea shall become free and independent.

description.zh-cn: 在德黑兰会议上，约瑟夫·斯大林表示“完全”赞成《开罗宣言》及其全部内容。
description.en: At the Tehran Conference, Joseph Stalin expressed his "full" approval of the Cairo Declaration and "all its contents."

description.zh-cn: 提出“爱国者治港”要求，推动了2021年对香港选举制度的根本性修改。
description.en: Proposed the requirement of "patriots governing Hong Kong," which drove the fundamental changes to Hong Kong's electoral system in 2021.

description.zh-cn: “完善选举制度改革”后，民主派政党的政治参与空间受到严重限制。
description.en: After the 'perfection of the electoral system reform,' the political participation space for pro-democracy parties was severely restricted.

description.zh-cn: 民主派对中国人权状况常有所批判，并以“结束一党专政”和“平反六四”作为其核心诉求之一。六四事件后，民主派与中共关系决裂。
description.en: The pro-democracy camp is often critical of the human rights situation in China and holds 'ending one-party rule' and 'vindicating the June 4th incident' as its core demands. After the June 4th incident, the relationship between the pro-democracy camp and the CCP broke down.

description.zh-cn: 在第十四届全国人大第二次会议主席台上，就最高人民法院工作报告内容进行口头讨论。
在第十四届全国人大第二次会议主席台上，就最高人民法院工作报告内容进行口头讨论，习近平还在报告上作了批注。
在第十四届全国人大第二次会议主席台上，就最高人民法院工作报告内容进行口头讨论。
因呼吸道感染请假，缺席全国人大会议闭幕日会议。
因赵乐际请假缺席，代为主持闭幕会。
在缺席人大会议闭幕式次日，赵乐际与李鸿忠一同公开活动，看望参与“两会”报道的新闻工作者。
在缺席人大会议闭幕式次日，赵乐际与李书磊一同公开活动，看望参与“两会”报道的新闻工作者。
南非于1998年1月1日与中华人民共和国建立外交关系。
description.en: South Africa established diplomatic relations with the People's Republic of China on January 1, 1998.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫政权是在日本军队的扶植下成立的。
description.en: The Wang Jingwei regime was established under the support of the Japanese military.

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行由中国人民银行的工商信贷和储蓄业务分离而设立。
description.en: ICBC was established by separating the industrial and commercial credit and savings business from the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院于1983年9月决定分拆中国人民银行的相关业务，成立一家新银行，即后来的中国工商银行。
description.en: In September 1983, the State Council of the People's Republic of China decided to spin off relevant businesses from the People's Bank of China to establish a new bank, which became ICBC.

description.zh-cn: 作为主要股东持有中国工商银行31.14%的股份。
description.en: Holds 31.14% of ICBC's shares as a major shareholder.

description.zh-cn: 通过其代理人公司香港中央结算代理人有限公司作为主要股东持有中国工商银行24.18%的股份。
description.en: Holds 24.18% of ICBC's shares as a major shareholder through its nominee, HKSCC Nominees Limited.

description.zh-cn: 西班牙警方以“涉及洗黑钱及税务欺诈”为名，突击搜查中国工商银行马德里分行，并拘捕5名银行管理层人员。
description.en: Spanish police raided the ICBC Madrid branch on suspicion of money laundering and tax fraud, arresting five members of the bank's management.

description.zh-cn: 美国在广岛和长崎投下原子弹，最终迫使大日本帝国投降。
description.en: The United States dropped atomic bombs on Hiroshima and Nagasaki, ultimately forcing the Empire of Japan to surrender.

description.zh-cn: 德川家康于1603年开创江户幕府。
description.en: Tokugawa Ieyasu founded the Edo shogunate in 1603.

description.zh-cn: 罗马皇帝君士坦丁一世发布《米兰敕令》，结束了对基督徒的迫害，为基督教的发展提供了有利条件。
description.en: Roman Emperor Constantine I issued the Edict of Milan, ending the persecution of Christians and creating favorable conditions for the development of Christianity.

description.zh-cn: 在改信基督教前，使徒保罗信奉犹太教并将基督教视为异端进行迫害。
description.en: Before converting to Christianity, the Apostle Paul adhered to Judaism and persecuted Christianity as a heresy.

description.zh-cn: 在改信基督教后，保罗成为向非犹太人族群传播基督信仰的主要推动者。
description.en: After his conversion to Christianity, Paul became a major proponent of spreading the Christian faith to non-Jewish communities.

description.zh-cn: 以中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会主席名义签署命令，将东北边防军改名为“中国人民志愿军”，并决定其入朝作战。
description.en: As Chairman of the People's Revolutionary Military Commission of the Central People's Government, he signed the order to rename the Northeast Border Defense Army to the 'Chinese People's Volunteer Army' and decided on its entry into the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 据称，黄炎培认为'支援军'的名称容易引发国际误解，建议改为'志愿军'，以表明中国并非与美国宣战，而是人民志愿支援朝鲜。
description.en: It is said that Huang Yanpei believed the name 'Support Army' could easily cause international misunderstanding and suggested changing it to 'Volunteer Army' to indicate that China was not declaring war on the US, but that its people were voluntarily supporting Korea.

description.zh-cn: 在军委会议上，将“支援军”改为“边防军”，并提出参战部队使用“志愿军”服装和旗帜，影响了部队的最终名称和形象。
description.en: At a Military Commission meeting, changed 'Support Army' to 'Border Defense Army' and proposed that combat troops use 'Volunteer Army' uniforms and flags, influencing the force's final name and image.

description.zh-cn: 同意了周恩来提出的苏联方面提供空军掩护和负责中国主要城市领空安全的要求，为志愿军出兵提供了重要支持。
