description.en: Agreed to Zhou Enlai's request for Soviet air cover and responsibility for the air defense of major Chinese cities, providing crucial support for the Volunteer Army's deployment.

description.zh-cn: 作为中央军委主席，命令召回驻板门店军事停战委员会的中国人民志愿军代表团，结束了其在朝鲜半岛的官方使命。
description.en: As Chairman of the Central Military Commission, he ordered the recall of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army delegation from the Military Armistice Commission in Panmunjom, ending its official mission on the Korean Peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军是中华人民共和国派出的赴朝作战部队。
description.en: The Chinese People's Volunteer Army was the expeditionary force dispatched by the People's Republic of China to fight in Korea.

description.zh-cn: 731部队是关东军下属的防疫给水部本部。
description.en: Unit 731 was the headquarters of the Epidemic Prevention and Water Purification Department under the Kwantung Army.

description.zh-cn: 二战后，美国为了获取731部队的研究数据，给予了石井四郎及其他主要成员战争罪豁免权，使其免于被起诉。
description.en: After World War II, the United States granted immunity from war crimes prosecution to Shirō Ishii and other key members in exchange for Unit 731's research data, allowing them to avoid prosecution.

description.zh-cn: 东京帝国大学向731部队派出了至少六名医学专家。
description.en: Tokyo Imperial University sent at least six medical experts to Unit 731.

description.zh-cn: 东北人民自治军改称为东北民主联军。
description.en: The Northeast People's Self-Governing Army was renamed the Northeast Democratic United Army.

description.zh-cn: 东北野战军（东北人民解放军的野战部队）改称为中国人民解放军第四野战军。
description.en: The Northeast Field Army (the field force of the Northeast People's Liberation Army) was renamed the Fourth Field Army of the Chinese People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 第四野战军直属中央军事委员会领导。
description.en: The Fourth Field Army was directly under the leadership of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 东北人民自治军由进军东北的八路军、新四军及东北抗日联军为骨干组建而成。
description.en: The Northeast People's Self-Governing Army was formed with the Eighth Route Army, New Fourth Army, and Northeast Anti-Japanese United Army that marched into the Northeast as its backbone.

description.zh-cn: 东北人民自治军由进军东北的八路军、新四军及东北抗日联军为骨干组建而成。
description.en: The Northeast People's Self-Governing Army was formed with the Eighth Route Army, New Fourth Army, and Northeast Anti-Japanese United Army that marched into the Northeast as its backbone.

description.zh-cn: 第四野战军在衡阳、宝庆及阳江、阳春地区击败白崇禧部主力。
description.en: The Fourth Field Army defeated the main forces of Bai Chongxi in the Hengyang, Baoqing, and Yangjiang, Yangchun areas.

description.zh-cn: 第四野战军将第164师和第156师的朝鲜族士兵转移编入朝鲜人民军。
description.en: The Fourth Field Army transferred Korean soldiers from the 164th and 156th Divisions to the Korean People's Army.

description.zh-cn: 购买黑石集团价值30亿美元的无投票权有限合伙单位。
description.en: Purchased $3 billion worth of non-voting limited partnership units in The Blackstone Group.

description.zh-cn: 三家分晋事件中，赵氏被正式承认为诸侯，建立了赵国。
description.en: During the Partition of Jin, the Zhao clan was officially recognized as a feudal lord, leading to the establishment of the State of Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 前403年，周威烈王正式册封赵烈侯、韩景侯、魏文侯为诸侯，标志着三家分晋的完成。
description.en: In 403 BCE, King Weilie of Zhou formally enfeoffed Marquis Lie of Zhao, Marquis Jing of Han, and Marquis Wen of Wei, marking the completion of the Partition of Jin.

description.zh-cn: 三家分晋最终导致晋国于前376年被瓜分完毕而灭亡。
description.en: The Partition of Jin ultimately led to the complete division and demise of the State of Jin in 376 BCE.

description.zh-cn: 赵国最终为秦国所灭。
description.en: The State of Zhao was ultimately conquered by the State of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 前228年，秦将王翦攻破赵都邯郸，俘虏赵王迁，赵国灭亡。
description.en: In 228 BCE, the Qin general Wang Jian captured Handan, the capital of Zhao, and took King Qian captive, leading to the fall of the State of Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 赵国在胡服骑射改革后，于前295年灭亡了中山国。
description.en: After the 'Wearing Hun clothes and shooting from horseback' reform, the State of Zhao conquered the State of Zhongshan in 295 BCE.

description.zh-cn: 1973年2月28日，经周恩来批准，全国政协举行活动，标志着其开始恢复活动。
description.en: On February 28, 1973, with Zhou Enlai's approval, the CPPCC National Committee held an event, marking the beginning of its resumption of activities.

description.zh-cn: 中国经济社会理事会是政协全国委员会下辖的全国性社会团体组织。
description.en: The China Economic and Social Council is a national social organization under the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 越南共产党是越南唯一的执政党，对国家实行全面领导。
description.en: The Communist Party of Vietnam is the sole ruling party, exercising comprehensive leadership over the state.

description.zh-cn: 1982年入读北京大学，后被保送至该校遥感技术应用研究所。
description.en: Enrolled in Peking University in 1982 and was later admitted to its Institute of Remote Sensing and GIS Application.

description.zh-cn: 1997年在莱顿大学研究儒家学说。
description.en: Researched Confucianism at Leiden University in 1997.

description.zh-cn: 作为学生领袖，担任北高联主席等多个领导职务，是运动的主要组织者和领导者之一。
description.en: As a student leader, he served as the chairman of the Beijing Students' Autonomous Federation and held several other leadership positions, making him one of the main organizers and leaders of the movement.

description.zh-cn: 六四事件后，封从德被北京市公安局通缉，在中国大陆逃亡十个月后流亡海外。
description.en: After the Tiananmen Square protests, Feng Congde was put on the wanted list by the Beijing Municipal Public Security Bureau, and he went into exile after being a fugitive in mainland China for ten months.

description.zh-cn: 作为八九民运学生领袖，遭中共当局通缉并流亡海外。其言论主张中共崩溃。
description.en: As a student leader of the 1989 democracy movement, he was wanted by the CCP authorities and went into exile. His statements advocate for the collapse of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 作为“义勇队”成员参加了黄麻起义。
description.en: Participated in the Huangma Uprising as a member of the 'Volunteer Corps'.

description.zh-cn: 在中华人民共和国成立35周年阅兵式上担任总指挥，陪同邓小平检阅部队。
description.en: Served as the general commander of the military parade for the 35th anniversary of the PRC, accompanying Deng Xiaoping to inspect the troops.

description.zh-cn: 秦基伟卸任国防部长后，由迟浩田接任。
description.en: After Qin Jiwei stepped down as Minister of Defense, Chi Haotian succeeded him.

description.zh-cn: 孟凡利于1986年3月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Meng Fanli joined the Communist Party of China in March 1986.

description.zh-cn: 在南开大学会计系西方会计专业在职攻读硕士研究生。
description.en: Pursued a master's degree in Western accounting in the Department of Accounting at Nankai University while working.

description.zh-cn: 孟凡利任广东省省长时，黄坤明任中共广东省委书记，是其直接上级。
description.en: When Meng Fanli was Governor of Guangdong, Huang Kunming was the Party Secretary of Guangdong, his direct superior.

description.zh-cn: 孟凡利接替王伟中担任广东省省长及深圳市委书记职务。
description.en: Meng Fanli succeeded Wang Weizhong as Governor of Guangdong and Party Secretary of Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 中央政治局在中央委员会全体会议闭会期间，行使中央委员会的职权。
description.en: The Political Bureau exercises the functions and powers of the Central Committee when the latter is not in session.

description.zh-cn: 1940年10月24日，贝当与希特勒在卢瓦河畔蒙图瓦尔会面，商讨两国间的合作事宜。
description.en: On October 24, 1940, Pétain met with Hitler at Montoire-sur-le-Loir to discuss collaboration between their two countries.

description.zh-cn: 在第一次朝核危机期间，金泳三与美国总统比尔·克林顿协调，成功劝阻了美国对朝鲜宁边核设施的军事打击计划。
description.en: During the First North Korean nuclear crisis, Kim Young-sam coordinated with U.S. President Bill Clinton and successfully dissuaded the U.S. from its plan to conduct a military strike on North Korea's Yongbyon nuclear facilities.

description.zh-cn: 受疫情打击，首都机场的旅客吞吐量大幅下滑。
description.en: Affected by the pandemic, the passenger throughput of Capital Airport declined sharply.

description.zh-cn: 于1950年报请中共中央，拟新建一座民航专用机场，即后来的首都机场。
description.en: In 1950, it proposed to the Central Committee of the CCP to build a new civil aviation airport, which later became Capital Airport.

description.zh-cn: 先后批准了首都机场2号航站楼扩建工程的可行性研究报告（1992年）和3号航站楼建设方案（2003年）。
description.en: Successively approved the feasibility study report for the Terminal 2 expansion project (1992) and the construction plan for Terminal 3 (2003).

description.zh-cn: 温云松是温家宝的儿子。
description.en: Wen Yunsong is the son of Wen Jiabao.

description.zh-cn: 温云松是温如春的哥哥。
description.en: Wen Yunsong is the brother of Wen Ruchun.

description.zh-cn: 温家宝曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Wen Jiabao served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 因温云松身份敏感为由，拒绝其求职申请。
description.en: Rejected his job application due to his sensitive background.

description.zh-cn: 何晶是新加坡总理李显龙的夫人。
description.en: Ho Ching is the wife of Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

description.zh-cn: 据博讯新闻称，媒体对温云松的负面报道与当时温家宝和江泽民派系（上海帮）的政治权力斗争有关。
description.en: According to Boxun News, negative media reports about Wen Yunsong were related to the political power struggle between Wen Jiabao and the Jiang Zemin faction (Shanghai clique) at the time.

description.zh-cn: 由于防火长城的审查机制，“温云松”成为网络搜索敏感词，导致其信息在百度、搜狗、新浪微博等平台被封锁或限制。
description.en: Due to the Great Firewall's censorship mechanism, 'Wen Yunsong' became a sensitive search term, leading to the blocking or restriction of his information on platforms like Baidu, Sogou, and Sina Weibo.

description.zh-cn: 福泽谕吉曾受雇于江户幕府，从事政府公文的翻译工作，并随幕府使节团出访海外。
description.en: Fukuzawa Yukichi was employed by the Edo Shogunate to translate government documents and accompanied its missions abroad.

description.zh-cn: 福泽谕吉在其《脱亚论》中对清朝持蔑视态度，视其为“恶友”，主张与其绝交。
description.en: In his 'Datsu-A Ron', Fukuzawa Yukichi held a contemptuous attitude towards the Qing dynasty, regarding it as a 'bad friend' and advocating for breaking ties.

description.zh-cn: 福泽谕吉在其《脱亚论》中对朝鲜王朝持蔑视态度，视其为“恶友”，主张与其绝交。
description.en: In his 'Datsu-A Ron', Fukuzawa Yukichi held a contemptuous attitude towards the Joseon dynasty, regarding it as a 'bad friend' and advocating for breaking ties.

description.zh-cn: 福泽谕吉1860年访问美国，这次经历让他受到文化震撼，并深刻认识到学习英语和西方制度的必要性。
description.en: Fukuzawa Yukichi's visit to the United States in 1860 caused him culture shock and made him profoundly aware of the necessity of learning English and Western systems.

description.zh-cn: 蔡元培曾两度担任北京大学校长，期间革新北大，开“学术”与“自由”之风，大量引进新人物，使北大成为新文化运动的中心。
description.en: Cai Yuanpei served as the President of Peking University twice, during which he reformed the university, fostering a spirit of 'academics' and 'freedom'. He brought in many new figures, making Peking University the center of the New Culture Movement.

description.zh-cn: 1927年，蔡元培在主持教育行政委员会期间，筹设并创办了中央研究院。
description.en: In 1927, while presiding over the Education Administrative Committee, Cai Yuanpei planned and founded the Academia Sinica.

description.zh-cn: 蔡元培担任中央研究院首任院长直至去世。
description.en: Cai Yuanpei served as the first President of Academia Sinica until his death.

description.zh-cn: 在1927年，蔡元培积极主张并参与了针对中国共产党的“清党”行动。
description.en: In 1927, Cai Yuanpei actively advocated for and participated in the 'Party purge' targeting the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 蔡元培主持的国民党中央监察委员会会议审定了一份应予看管的共产党人名单，其中包括毛泽东。
description.en: A meeting of the KMT Central Supervisory Committee, presided over by Cai Yuanpei, approved a list of Communists to be placed under surveillance, which included Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 蔡元培主持的国民党中央监察委员会会议审定了一份应予看管的共产党人名单，其中包括周恩来。
description.en: A meeting of the KMT Central Supervisory Committee, presided over by Cai Yuanpei, approved a list of Communists to be placed under surveillance, which included Zhou Enlai.

description.zh-cn: 蔡元培主持的国民党中央监察委员会会议审定了一份应予看管的共产党人名单，其中包括陈独秀。
description.en: A meeting of the KMT Central Supervisory Committee, presided over by Cai Yuanpei, approved a list of Communists to be placed under surveillance, which included Chen Duxiu.

description.zh-cn: 蔡元培在莱比锡大学研究哲学、美学、心理学和民族学。
description.en: Cai Yuanpei studied philosophy, aesthetics, psychology, and ethnology at Leipzig University.

description.zh-cn: 与宋庆龄、鲁迅、杨杏佛等人共同组织中国民权保障同盟，并被选为副主席。
description.en: Co-founded the China League for Civil Rights with Soong Ching-ling, Lu Xun, and Yang Xingfo, and was elected as its vice-chairman.

description.zh-cn: 蔡元培因不满袁世凯的专制统治，于1912年7月辞去教育总长职务。
description.en: Cai Yuanpei resigned from his post as Minister of Education in July 1912 due to his dissatisfaction with Yuan Shikai's autocratic rule.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在蔡元培逝世后发出唁电，称其为“学界泰斗，人世楷模”，高度评价并巩固其历史地位。
description.en: After Cai Yuanpei's death, Mao Zedong sent a condolence telegram praising him as a 'titan of the academic world and a model for all,' highly evaluating and solidifying his historical status.

description.zh-cn: 因不满广东土改进展缓慢，毛泽东于1951年11月后将赵紫阳与陶铸一同调往广东参与领导土改工作。
description.en: Dissatisfied with the slow progress of land reform in Guangdong, Mao Zedong transferred Zhao Ziyang along with Tao Zhu after November 1951 to participate in leading the land reform work.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯曾派兵进攻山西，阻挠阎锡山回太原。
description.en: Yuan Shikai once sent troops to attack Shanxi and obstruct Yan Xishan's return to Taiyuan.

description.zh-cn: 在中原大战中与冯玉祥结盟，共同反对蒋介石。
description.en: Allied with Feng Yuxiang during the Central Plains War to jointly oppose Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 张学良通电支持蒋介石，并派兵入关，导致阎锡山在中原大战中失败。
description.en: Zhang Xueliang declared his support for Chiang Kai-shek and sent troops into the Shanhai Pass, leading to Yan Xishan's defeat in the Central Plains War.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次国共内战期间，阎锡山作为国民党将领与中国人民解放军作战。
description.en: During the second Chinese Civil War, Yan Xishan, as a KMT general, fought against the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 邀请华罗庚建立中国科学院数学研究所。
description.en: Invited Hua Luogeng to establish the Institute of Mathematics of the Chinese Academy of Sciences.

position.zh-cn: 助教、讲师、正教授、数学系主任
position.en: Teaching Assistant, Lecturer, Full Professor, Head of Mathematics Department

description.zh-cn: 1931年起在清华大学工作学习，先后任助教（1933年）、讲师（1934年）、正教授（1937-1945年）。1950年回国后担任数学系主任。
description.en: Began working and studying at Tsinghua University in 1931, successively serving as a teaching assistant (1933), lecturer (1934), and full professor (1937-1945). After returning to China in 1950, he became the head of the mathematics department.

description.zh-cn: 在反右斗争、文化大革命等政治运动中，华罗庚受到毛泽东的特别关照和保护。
description.en: During political campaigns such as the Anti-Rightist Campaign and the Cultural Revolution, Hua Luogeng received special attention and protection from Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 在反右斗争、文化大革命等政治运动中，华罗庚受到周恩来的特别关照和保护。
description.en: During political campaigns such as the Anti-Rightist Campaign and the Cultural Revolution, Hua Luogeng received special attention and protection from Zhou Enlai.

description.zh-cn: 由于水门事件导致理查德·尼克松总统辞职，时任副总统杰拉尔德·福特继任成为美国总统。
description.en: Following President Richard Nixon's resignation due to the Watergate scandal, Vice President Gerald Ford succeeded to the presidency.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国于1948年在美国占领军的支持下建立。
description.en: The Republic of Korea was established in 1948 with the support of the U.S. occupation forces.

description.zh-cn: 窝阔台是成吉思汗的第三子。
description.en: Ögedei was the third son of Genghis Khan.

description.zh-cn: 通过熙河开边，宋军收复河、洮、岷等五州，占领了西夏两千里土地，对西夏形成了战略包围态势。
description.en: Through the Xihe Expansion, the Song army recovered five prefectures including He, Tao, and Min, occupied two thousand li of Western Xia's territory, and formed a strategic encirclement of Western Xia.

description.zh-cn: 景德元年（1004年），辽朝大举入侵宋朝，兵锋直指澶州。
description.en: In the first year of the Jingde era (1004), the Liao dynasty launched a major invasion of the Song dynasty, with their forces advancing directly on Chanzhou.

description.zh-cn: 宋希濂在西南战役中兵败，于四川峨边县被中国人民解放军俘虏。
description.en: Song Xilian was defeated in the Southwest Campaign and captured by the People's Liberation Army in Ebian County, Sichuan.

position.en: Commissioner for Historical and Cultural Materials, Standing Committee Member

description.zh-cn: 1959年获特赦后，先后担任全国政协文史专员和常务委员。
description.en: After being granted amnesty in 1959, he served as a Commissioner for Historical and Cultural Materials and a Standing Committee Member of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊接替黄坤明担任中共中央宣传部部长。
description.en: Li Shulei succeeded Huang Kunming as the Head of the Propaganda Department of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊先后在北京大学获得图书馆学学士、中国现代文学硕士和博士学位。
description.en: Li Shulei obtained his bachelor's degree in library science, and master's and doctoral degrees in modern Chinese literature from Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 在中央党校共事期间，李书磊受到时任校长习近平的赏识，为其后续的政治晋升奠定了基础。
description.en: During their time working together at the Central Party School, Li Shulei was appreciated by then-President Xi Jinping, which laid the foundation for his subsequent political advancement.

description.zh-cn: 担任福建省委宣传部长期间，亲自倡议、策划并修改了《福建日报》上关于习近平福建工作往事的三万余字系列报道，旨在宣传习近平的执政理念和经历。
description.en: While serving as the Head of the Propaganda Department of the Fujian Provincial Party Committee, he personally initiated, planned, and edited a series of reports in the Fujian Daily totaling over 30,000 words about Xi Jinping's past work in Fujian, aiming to promote Xi's governing philosophy and experience.

description.zh-cn: 韩非出使秦国，后被迫侍奉秦始皇。
description.en: Han Fei went to the State of Qin as an envoy and was later forced to serve Qin Shi Huang.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯通过其手下段祺瑞等北洋将领通电威胁，迫使隆裕太后代表宣统皇帝颁布退位诏书，结束了清朝的统治。
description.en: Through his subordinate Duan Qirui and other Beiyang generals, Yuan Shikai threatened the court, forcing Empress Dowager Longyu to issue the abdication edict on behalf of the Xuantong Emperor, ending the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯在北京就任中华民国临时大总统，建立了北洋政府，开启了北洋军阀统治时期。
description.en: Yuan Shikai took office as the Provisional President of the Republic of China in Beijing, establishing the Beiyang government and initiating the Beiyang warlord era.

description.zh-cn: 在戊戌变法期间，康有为派谭嗣同秘密游说手握重兵的袁世凯，希望他发动兵变支持光绪帝。
description.en: During the Hundred Days' Reform, Kang Youwei sent Tan Sitong to secretly lobby Yuan Shikai, who controlled a powerful army, hoping he would launch a coup to support the Guangxu Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 在陈炯明部队炮轰总统府时，叶挺奉命守卫并掩护宋庆龄安全脱险。
陈炯明的部队炮轰总统府，叶挺率部抵抗。
在北伐战争中，叶挺率部讨伐吴佩孚势力。
广州起义失败后，叶挺在苏联受到李立三的无端指责，是其决定退出共产党的原因之一。
广州起义失败后，叶挺在苏联受到王明的无端指责，是其决定退出共产党的原因之一。
周恩来多次与叶挺沟通，鼓励并说服其重返革命队伍，最终促成叶挺出任新四军军长并重返部队。
邀请叶挺访问延安，打消了中共方面对其脱党的疑虑，促使其顺利就任新四军军长。
两人在新四军的一系列战略问题上产生分歧，关系不睦，导致叶挺多次离军出走。
墨索里尼与希特勒是政治盟友，共同组建了轴心国联盟。
description.en: Mussolini and Hitler were political allies who formed the Axis powers.

description.zh-cn: 曹昂是曹操的长子。
description.en: Cao Ang was the eldest son of Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 在宛城之战中，曹昂将自己的坐骑让给被射伤的曹操，并步行保护其突围，使曹操得以幸免于难。
description.en: During the Battle of Wancheng, Cao Ang gave his own horse to the wounded Cao Cao and protected him on foot during the breakout, allowing Cao Cao to escape.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕称帝后，于黄初二年（221年）追尊曹昂为丰悼公，黄初五年（224年）追封为丰悼王，以示哀悼和尊崇。
description.en: After becoming emperor, Cao Pi posthumously honored Cao Ang as Duke Dao of Feng in 221 AD and later as King Dao of Feng in 224 AD, to show mourning and respect.

description.zh-cn: 魏明帝曹叡继位后，于太和三年（229年）改谥曹昂为丰愍王。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Emperor Ming of Wei, Cao Rui, changed Cao Ang's posthumous title to King Min of Feng in 229 AD.

description.zh-cn: 曹昂在二十岁时被举为孝廉，这是东汉的一种官吏选拔科目。
description.en: At the age of twenty, Cao Ang was nominated as a Xiaolian, which was a category for official selection in the Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 与张申府一同在德国柏林介绍朱德加入中国共产党。
description.en: Together with Zhang Shenfu, introduced Zhu De to join the Communist Party of China in Berlin, Germany.

description.zh-cn: 在上海初次会面时，因认为朱德军阀气息太重而拒绝其入党申请。
description.en: During their first meeting in Shanghai, rejected Zhu De's application to join the party, believing he had too much of a warlord air.

description.zh-cn: 朱德是中国人民解放军的主要缔造者之一。
description.en: Zhu De is one of the main founders of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 在庐山会议期间，因朱德在批判彭德怀时肯定其积极一面，而批评朱德“未抓到痒处”。
description.en: During the Lushan Conference, criticized Zhu De for 'not scratching the itch' because Zhu affirmed Peng Dehuai's positive side while criticizing him.

description.zh-cn: 颜回是孔子最得意的弟子，位居孔门七十二贤之首。
description.en: Yan Hui was Confucius's most favored disciple, ranked first among the Seventy-two Disciples.

description.zh-cn: 颜回与子路同为孔子弟子，曾一同侍奉孔子。
description.en: Yan Hui and Zilu were fellow disciples of Confucius and once served him together.

description.zh-cn: 孔鲤是孔子的儿子。
description.en: Kong Li was the son of Confucius.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗于开元二十七年（739年）封颜回为“兖公”。
description.en: In 739 (the 27th year of the Kaiyuan era), Emperor Xuanzong of Tang enfeoffed Yan Hui as 'Duke of Yan'.

description.zh-cn: 明世宗于嘉靖九年（1530年）改封颜回为“复圣”。
description.en: In 1530 (the 9th year of the Jiajing era), the Jiajing Emperor changed Yan Hui's title to 'Continuator Sage'.

description.zh-cn: 卡尔·马克思于1844年4月至8月间撰写了《1844年经济学哲学手稿》。
description.en: Karl Marx wrote the 'Economic and Philosophic Manuscripts of 1844' between April and August 1844.

description.zh-cn: 担任马来西亚政府首脑。
description.en: Serves as the head of government of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 荷兰于1641年联合柔佛攻下葡属马六甲。
description.en: The Dutch, in alliance with Johor, captured Portuguese Malacca in 1641.

description.zh-cn: 荷兰是欧洲联盟（其前身为欧洲经济共同体）的创始成员国之一。
description.en: The Netherlands is one of the founding members of the European Union (formerly the European Economic Community).

description.zh-cn: 荷兰是北大西洋公约组织的创始成员国之一。
description.en: The Netherlands is one of the founding members of NATO.

description.zh-cn: 1975年，荷兰承认前殖民地苏里南独立。
description.en: In 1975, the Netherlands recognized the independence of its former colony, Suriname.

description.zh-cn: 赵匡胤通过陈桥兵变篡夺后周，结束五代。
description.en: Zhao Kuangyin usurped the Later Zhou through the Chen Bridge Mutiny, ending the Five Dynasties period.

description.zh-cn: 建立宋朝。
description.en: Established the Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝时期，汉朝为打击匈奴势力，积极寻求与西域各国建立军事同盟。
description.en: During the reign of Emperor Wu, the Han dynasty actively sought military alliances with states in the Western Regions to attack the Xiongnu forces.

description.zh-cn: 在北宋时期，西夏政权地处河西走廊，阻隔了宋朝与西域的传统陆上商路。
description.en: During the Northern Song Dynasty, the Western Xia regime was located in the Hexi Corridor, blocking the traditional overland trade route between the Song court and the Western Regions.

description.zh-cn: 通过西征和建立蒙古帝国，重新打通并保障了欧亚大陆的商路（尤其是草原丝绸之路）的畅通。
description.en: Through his western conquests and the establishment of the Mongol Empire, he reopened and secured the trade routes across Eurasia, especially the Steppe Silk Road.

description.zh-cn: 在辖境内推行驿站交通系统，极大地促进了丝绸之路的畅通和沿线商贸往来。
description.en: Implemented the Yam (postal station) system within its territory, greatly facilitating the flow of traffic and trade along the Silk Road.

description.zh-cn: 佛教自于阗沿丝绸之路全面传入西域各国，并最终传播至中原。
description.en: Buddhism spread comprehensively from Khotan to the states of the Western Regions along the Silk Road, and eventually reached the Central Plains of China.

description.zh-cn: 李克农担任副总参谋长期间，罗瑞卿为时任总参谋长。
description.en: When Li Kenong served as Deputy Chief of the General Staff, Luo Ruiqing was the Chief of the General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 同为“龙潭三杰”成员，在中共中央特科共事。
description.en: Both were members of the 'Longtan Three Heroes' and worked together in the CCP Central Special Branch.

description.zh-cn: 获取顾顺章叛变的情报后，派人通知李克农。
description.en: After obtaining intelligence about Gu Shunzhang's defection, sent someone to inform Li Kenong.

description.zh-cn: 及时转报顾顺章叛变的情报，使中共中央机关得以安全转移。
description.en: Promptly relayed the intelligence of Gu Shunzhang's defection, allowing the CCP Central Committee organs to safely relocate.

description.zh-cn: 在中共中央特科领导下从事秘密情报工作。
description.en: Engaged in secret intelligence work under the leadership of the CCP Central Special Branch.

description.zh-cn: 作为中共代表团秘书长，协助周恩来处理西安事变，促进国共谈判。
description.en: As secretary-general of the CCP delegation, assisted Zhou Enlai in handling the Xi'an Incident and promoting KMT-CCP negotiations.

description.zh-cn: 在西安事变及日内瓦会议等多个场合，作为周恩来的助手开展工作。
description.en: Worked as Zhou Enlai's assistant on multiple occasions, including the Xi'an Incident and the Geneva Conference.

description.zh-cn: 在张国焘叛逃中共时将其扣留。
description.en: Detained Zhang Guotao when he defected from the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 在中共中央后方委员会期间，于叶剑英领导下开展情报工作。
description.en: During his time at the CCP Central Rear Committee, he conducted intelligence work under the leadership of Ye Jianying.

description.zh-cn: 领导破获了国民党特工密谋刺杀毛泽东的案件，保护了其安全。
description.en: Led the effort to foil a Kuomintang assassination plot against Mao Zedong, ensuring his safety.

description.zh-cn: 在李克农诞辰九十周年时，作为中华人民共和国主席高度评价李克农。
description.en: As President of the People's Republic of China, highly praised Li Kenong on the 90th anniversary of his birth.

position.en: Prefect of the Gentlemen of the Palace, Middle Chancellor

description.zh-cn: 秦二世登基后，赵高升任郎中令，后又成为中丞相，独揽朝政。
description.en: After Qin Er Shi ascended the throne, Zhao Gao was promoted to Prefect of the Gentlemen of the Palace and later became the Middle Chancellor, monopolizing state power.

description.zh-cn: 赵高曾担任公子胡亥（后来的秦二世）的老师，教授他决断讼案。
description.en: Zhao Gao served as a tutor to Prince Huhai (later Qin Er Shi), teaching him how to adjudicate legal cases.

description.zh-cn: 在沙丘之变后，赵高挑唆秦二世，致使蒙恬被囚禁并最终服毒自尽。
description.en: After the Shaqiu Coup, Zhao Gao incited Qin Er Shi, leading to Meng Tian's imprisonment and eventual suicide by poison.

description.zh-cn: 赵高为测试群臣，策划了指鹿为马事件，以清除异己，巩固权力。
description.en: To test the ministers, Zhao Gao orchestrated the 'pointing to a deer and calling it a horse' incident to eliminate dissenters and consolidate power.

description.zh-cn: 在巨鹿之战中，项羽率领的军队击败了章邯率领的秦军主力。
description.en: At the Battle of Julu, the army led by Xiang Yu defeated the main force of the Qin army led by Zhang Han.

description.zh-cn: 章邯派长史司马欣向赵高请示，赵高拒不接见，加剧了章邯的恐惧和不信任，最终导致其投降。
description.en: Zhang Han sent his chief clerk Sima Xin to consult Zhao Gao, but Zhao Gao refused to see him, exacerbating Zhang Han's fear and distrust, which ultimately led to his surrender.

description.zh-cn: 赵高在杀死秦二世后，曾派使者联络刘邦，欲与关东诸侯共同瓜分秦朝，但遭到刘邦拒绝。
description.en: After killing Qin Er Shi, Zhao Gao sent an emissary to contact Liu Bang, intending to divide the Qin territory with the eastern lords, but was refused by Liu Bang.

description.zh-cn: 1950年，孟小冬在香港与杜月笙办理结婚手续，成为其妾室，直至1951年杜月笙去世。
description.en: In 1950, Meng Xiaodong married Du Yuesheng in Hong Kong, becoming his concubine until his death in August 1951.

description.zh-cn: 与刘揆一、章士钊、宋教仁等人共同创立华兴会。
description.en: Co-founded the Huaxinghui with Liu Kuiyi, Zhang Shizhao, Song Jiaoren, and others.

description.zh-cn: 发动二次革命武装讨伐袁世凯。
description.en: Launched the Second Revolution, an armed campaign against Yuan Shikai.

description.zh-cn: 黄兴逝世时，蔡锷写下挽联悼念，两人同为革命元勋，并同葬于岳麓山。
description.en: When Huang Xing passed away, Cai E wrote a couplet in mourning. Both were founding fathers of the revolution and are buried together on Yuelu Mountain.

description.zh-cn: 章太炎很敬重黄兴，曾愿拥戴其为同盟会领袖，并在其追悼会上送挽联：“无公则无民国，有史必有斯人。”
description.en: Zhang Taiyan held great respect for Huang Xing, once wishing to support him as the leader of the Tongmenghui, and sent a couplet to his memorial service that read: 'Without you, there would be no Republic; as long as there is history, there will be this man.'

description.zh-cn: 项羽在楚汉战争中最终失败，于垓下被围，突围至乌江边自刎而死。
description.en: Xiang Yu was ultimately defeated in the Chu-Han Contention, surrounded at Gaixia, and committed suicide at the Wu River after a failed breakout.

description.zh-cn: 陈平使用反间计，成功使项羽猜忌范增，导致范增辞归，最终病死途中，为刘邦清除了一个重要障碍。
description.en: Chen Ping used a stratagem to successfully make Xiang Yu suspicious of Fan Zeng, which led to Fan Zeng's resignation and subsequent death, removing a major obstacle for Liu Bang.

description.zh-cn: 刘邦还定三秦时，击败章邯，将其围困于废丘，章邯最终自杀。
description.en: When Liu Bang conquered the Three Qins, he defeated Zhang Han and besieged him in Feiqiu, leading to Zhang Han's suicide.

description.zh-cn: 在林彪出逃的“九一三事件”中，周恩来全程主持了对该事件的处理工作。
description.en: During the 'September 13 Incident' of Lin Biao's defection, Zhou Enlai managed the handling of the entire event.

description.zh-cn: 在“榄杆市事件”后，周恩来下令由政府组织“红卫兵联络站”并派人民解放军保护红卫兵的抄家行动。
description.en: After the 'Langan'shi Incident,' Zhou Enlai ordered the government to organize 'Red Guard Liaison Stations' and dispatched the People's Liberation Army to protect the Red Guards' home-raiding actions.

description.zh-cn: 铁凝在第十四届全国人民代表大会上当选为全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: Tie Ning was elected as a Vice Chairperson of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress at the 14th National People's Congress.

position.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会副委员长
position.en: Vice Chairperson of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 在赵乐际担任全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长期间，铁凝担任副委员长。
description.en: Tie Ning serves as Vice Chairperson while Zhao Leji is the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 铁凝接替巴金，担任中国作家协会主席。
description.en: Tie Ning succeeded Ba Jin as the Chairperson of the China Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 作为国家主席习近平特使，出席墨西哥总统权力交接仪式。
description.en: Served as the special envoy of President Xi Jinping to attend the presidential inauguration ceremony in Mexico.

description.zh-cn: 田汉在长沙师范学校就读时，校长是徐特立。
description.en: When Tian Han studied at Changsha Normal School, Xu Teli was the principal.

description.zh-cn: 1930年，在安娥影响下，田汉加入了“左联”。
description.en: In 1930, under the influence of An E, Tian Han joined the "League of Left-Wing Writers".

description.zh-cn: 1932年加入中国共产党。1975年被死后“永远开除党籍”，1979年平反并恢复党籍。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China in 1932. He was posthumously "permanently expelled from the party" in 1975, and was rehabilitated and had his membership restored in 1979.

description.zh-cn: 1966年7月，田汉被红卫兵批斗。
description.en: In July 1966, Tian Han was subjected to struggle sessions by the Red Guards.

description.zh-cn: 1979年4月，中共为田汉平反，恢复其党籍和名誉。
description.en: In April 1979, the CCP posthumously rehabilitated Tian Han, restoring his party membership and reputation.

position.en: Seal-holding Eunuch of the Directorate of Ceremonial

description.zh-cn: 魏忠贤是明熹宗的司礼监秉笔太监，深受其宠信，逐渐专擅朝政。
description.en: Wei Zhongxian served as the Seal-holding Eunuch for Emperor Xizong of Ming. Deeply trusted by the emperor, he gradually came to dominate the court.

description.zh-cn: 魏忠贤于天启三年十二月开始总督东厂，利用这一特务机构大肆清除异己。
description.en: Wei Zhongxian took charge of the Eastern Depot in December 1623, using this spy agency to extensively eliminate his opponents.

description.zh-cn: 在与东林党的斗争中，魏忠贤利用其权力，诬陷、罢黜乃至杀害了大量东林党人，包括“东林六君子”和“东林七君子”。
description.en: In his struggle against the Donglin Party, Wei Zhongxian used his power to frame, dismiss, and even kill a large number of its members, including the 'Six Gentlemen of Donglin' and the 'Seven Gentlemen of Donglin'.

description.zh-cn: 为在朝中自保，时任辽东巡抚的袁崇焕曾上疏颂扬魏忠贤的功德，并为其请求建立生祠。
description.en: To protect his position at court, Yuan Chonghuan, then governor of Liaodong, submitted a memorial praising Wei Zhongxian's merits and requested the construction of a living shrine in his honor.

description.zh-cn: 陈吉宁于2015年2月被任命为中华人民共和国环境保护部部长。
description.en: Chen Jining was appointed as the Minister of Environmental Protection of the People's Republic of China in February 2015.

description.zh-cn: 朱温于882年率部投降唐朝，被授以官职，成为唐末的藩镇节度使。
description.en: In 882, Zhu Wen surrendered to the Tang dynasty with his troops and was appointed as an official, becoming a provincial military governor (jiedushi) in the late Tang period.

description.zh-cn: 李南央是范元甄的女儿。
description.en: Li Nanyang is the daughter of Fan Yuanzhen.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平担任中央书记处总书记，负责处理中央书记处运作。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping served as the General Secretary of the Central Secretariat, responsible for its operations.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦在中央书记处重新设立后担任总书记。
description.en: Hu Yaobang served as General Secretary after the Central Secretariat was re-established.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在担任中央书记处总书记期间，兼任国务院副总理。
description.en: While serving as General Secretary of the Central Secretariat, Deng Xiaoping concurrently held the position of Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 1946年至1951年在北京大学物理系、机械系学习。
description.en: Studied in the Department of Physics and the Department of Mechanics at Peking University from 1946 to 1951.

description.zh-cn: 在六四事件中，因同情学生运动，支持时任中共中央总书记赵紫阳，而被免去党内领导职务。
description.en: During the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, he was dismissed from his party leadership positions for sympathizing with the student movement and supporting the then-General Secretary Zhao Ziyang.

description.zh-cn: 在六四事件中，同情学生运动并支持赵紫阳。
description.en: During the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, he sympathized with the student movement and supported Zhao Ziyang.

description.zh-cn: 1955年8月，胡启立在当选中华全国学生联合会主席后，受到毛泽东的接见。
description.en: In August 1955, after being elected chairman of the All-China Students' Federation, Hu Qili was received by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝的建立取代了北周。
description.en: The establishment of the Sui dynasty replaced the Northern Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝的建立标志着以长安为中心的隋朝正统的终结。
description.en: The establishment of the Tang dynasty marked the end of the legitimate Sui dynasty centered in Chang'an.

description.zh-cn: 在宣布戒严后，指示国军防谍司令部以“反国家势力”为由将其列入逮捕名单。
description.en: After declaring martial law, instructed the Defense Counterintelligence Command to add him to an arrest list under the pretext of being an "anti-state force."

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜劳动党在1980年将主体思想确立为唯一指导思想。
description.en: The Workers' Party of Korea established Juche as the sole guiding ideology in 1980.

description.zh-cn: 1984年，受好友邓朴方力邀，俞正声出任中国残疾人福利基金会负责人。
description.en: In 1984, at the strong invitation of his friend Deng Pufang, Yu Zhengsheng became the head of the China Disabled Persons' Federation.

description.zh-cn: 俞正声主政上海期间，成功举办了2010年上海世博会，但也因经济停滞、外来人口激增等问题引发争议和市民不满。
description.en: During his tenure as the head of Shanghai, Yu Zhengsheng successfully hosted the 2010 Shanghai Expo, but also faced controversy and public dissatisfaction due to issues such as economic stagnation and a sharp increase in the migrant population.

position.en: Member of the Politburo Standing Committee

description.zh-cn: 在习近平担任中共中央总书记期间，俞正声任中央政治局常委。
description.en: While Xi Jinping served as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, Yu Zhengsheng was a member of the Politburo Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 汪洋接替俞正声，担任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席职务。
description.en: Wang Yang succeeded Yu Zhengsheng as the Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 俞正声曾就读于哈尔滨军事工程学院（现中国人民解放军国防科技大学），并于1968年毕业。
description.en: Yu Zhengsheng studied at the Harbin Military Engineering Institute (now the National University of Defense Technology) and graduated in 1968.

description.zh-cn: 在武汉会战前的御前会议中，裕仁天皇表示要给国民政府最后致命的一击，迫使中国投降。
description.en: In an Imperial Conference before the Battle of Wuhan, Emperor Hirohito stated the need to deal a final, fatal blow to the Nationalist Government to force China's surrender.

description.zh-cn: 时任国务院总理温家宝提名刘志军担任中华人民共和国铁道部部长。
description.en: Then-Premier Wen Jiabao nominated Liu Zhijun to be the Minister of Railways of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 时任国家主席胡锦涛根据全国人民代表大会的决定，任命刘志军为铁道部部长。
description.en: Then-President Hu Jintao appointed Liu Zhijun as Minister of Railways in accordance with the decision of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 在刘志军担任铁道部部长期间，温家宝是其上级（国务院总理）。
description.en: During Liu Zhijun's tenure as Minister of Railways, Wen Jiabao was his superior (Premier of the State Council).

description.zh-cn: 国家审计署在对京沪高铁的审计中发现了与刘志军有关的线索，直接导致了对其的调查。
description.en: The National Audit Office discovered clues related to Liu Zhijun during its audit of the Beijing-Shanghai High-Speed Railway, which directly led to the investigation against him.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面信息框，良十四世是天主教会的领袖教宗。
description.en: According to the page's infobox, Leo XIV is the Pope, the leader of the Catholic Church.

description.zh-cn: 利玛窦是耶稣会的会士。
description.en: Matteo Ricci was a member of the Society of Jesus (Jesuits).

description.zh-cn: 利玛窦在明朝中叶成功进入中国传教，使天主教再次在中国传播开来。
description.en: Matteo Ricci successfully entered China to conduct missionary work in the mid-Ming Dynasty, leading to the renewed spread of Catholicism in China.

description.zh-cn: 张高丽曾任中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Zhang Gaoli served as a Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 美国众议院以428票对0票通过决议，谴责国际奥委会与中国政府合作，违反其人权承诺，帮助北京掩盖张高丽对彭帅的性侵指控。
description.en: The U.S. House of Representatives passed a resolution 428-0, condemning the IOC for cooperating with the Chinese government, in violation of its own human rights commitments, to help Beijing cover up the sexual assault allegations against Peng Shuai by Zhang Gaoli.

description.zh-cn: 在1962年9月的中共八届十中全会上，毛泽东提出要进行社会主义教育运动，并于1963年正式发动了该运动。
description.en: At the 10th Plenary Session of the 8th CCP Central Committee in September 1962, Mao Zedong proposed to carry out the Socialist Education Movement, which was formally launched in 1963.

description.zh-cn: 刘少奇在全国范围内推广王光美的“桃园经验”，使其成为指导四清运动的重要模式。
description.en: Liu Shaoqi promoted Wang Guangmei's 'Taoyuan Experience' nationwide, making it an important model for guiding the Four Cleanups Movement.

description.zh-cn: 陈伯达极力主张将王光美的“桃园经验”报告下发各地进行推广。
description.en: Chen Boda strongly advocated for the distribution and promotion of Wang Guangmei's 'Taoyuan Experience' report to all localities.

description.zh-cn: 陈梦是黄晓明的表妹。
description.en: Chen Meng is Huang Xiaoming's cousin.

description.zh-cn: 黄晓明于2007年至2010年签约华谊兄弟文化经纪公司。
description.en: Huang Xiaoming was signed with Huayi Brothers Culture and Brokerage Co. from 2007 to 2010.

description.zh-cn: 列夫·托洛茨基是十月革命的实际指挥者。
description.en: Leon Trotsky was the de facto commander of the October Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 斯大林将托洛茨基及其领导的左翼反对派强力镇压，并于1929年将其流放出苏联。
description.en: Stalin forcefully suppressed Trotsky and the Left Opposition he led, and exiled him from the Soviet Union in 1929.

description.zh-cn: 在西班牙内战中，斯大林主义路线清剿托洛茨基主义者并从西班牙撤军，最终导致了工人阶级的惨败和法西斯的胜利。
description.en: During the Spanish Civil War, the Stalinist line involved purging Trotskyists and withdrawing troops from Spain, which ultimately led to the crushing defeat of the working class and the victory of fascism.

description.zh-cn: 明朝洪武三十一年（1398年），为防倭寇袭扰，在奇山北麓建奇山守御千户所城，并在“北山”设烽火台。
description.en: In 1398, during the reign of the Hongwu Emperor of the Ming dynasty, the Qishan Guard was established at the northern foot of Mount Qi, and a beacon tower was set up on the 'North Mountain' to defend against raids by Wokou pirates.

position.zh-cn: 执行董事, 首席执行长

description.zh-cn: 何晶于2002年5月被任命为淡马锡控股的执行董事，2004年1月出任首席执行长，直至2021年10月退休。
为胡善祥追上尊谥“恭让诚顺康穆静慈章皇后”，并修陵寝，恢复其皇后名分。
description.en: Posthumously honored Hu Shanxiang with the title 'Empress Gongrang Chengshun Kangmu Jingci Zhang', restored her tomb, and reinstated her status as empress.

description.zh-cn: 公元前313年，张仪担任楚国相国。
description.en: In 313 BC, Zhang Yi served as the chancellor of the State of Chu.

description.zh-cn: 在局长胡佛的指令下，联邦调查局对金进行监视、窃听，并试图通过揭露其私生活和寄送匿名信等方式来胁迫他，以削弱其作为民权领袖的地位。
description.en: Under Director Hoover's orders, the FBI conducted surveillance, wiretapped King, and attempted to coerce him by exposing his private life and sending an anonymous letter, aiming to neutralize him as a civil rights leader.

description.zh-cn: 刘备与公孙瓒在卢植门下学习时结为好友，刘备视其为兄长。
description.en: Liu Bei and Gongsun Zan became good friends while studying under Lu Zhi, with Liu Bei treating him as an elder brother.

description.zh-cn: 陈云被认为是1980年代保守派的代表人物。
description.en: Chen Yun is considered a representative figure of the conservative faction in the 1980s.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来被认为是保守派人物。
description.en: Bo Xilai is considered a conservative figure.

description.zh-cn: 因对胡耀邦在八六学潮中过于软弱不满，保守派促使其下台。
description.en: Dissatisfied with Hu Yaobang's perceived weakness in handling the 1986 student protests, the conservative faction contributed to his downfall.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平南巡讲话后，重新确立改革开放大趋势，保守派势力大减。
description.en: After Deng Xiaoping's southern tour speeches, the trend of reform and opening-up was re-established, and the influence of the conservative faction was greatly diminished.

description.zh-cn: 因批评习近平的“独裁统治”，原中共中央党校教授蔡霞被开除党籍。
description.en: For criticizing Xi Jinping's 'dictatorial rule', former Central Party School professor Cai Xia was expelled from the party.

description.zh-cn: 李承晚为游说美国维护韩国独立而与时任美国总统罗斯福会面，但未获支持。
description.en: Syngman Rhee met with then-U.S. President Theodore Roosevelt to lobby for the maintenance of Korean independence, but did not receive support.

description.zh-cn: 文在寅是朴槿惠的主要政治对手，曾在2012年总统选举中败给朴槿惠，后在2017年朴槿惠被弹劾后当选总统。朴槿惠政府曾将文在寅列入政治黑名单。
description.en: Moon Jae-in was a major political rival to Park Geun-hye. He lost to her in the 2012 presidential election but was elected in 2017 after Park's impeachment. Park's government had placed Moon on a political blacklist.

description.zh-cn: 文在寅卸任后参加了继任者尹锡悦的总统就职典礼。
description.en: After leaving office, Moon Jae-in attended the presidential inauguration of his successor, Yoon Suk-yeol.

description.zh-cn: 尹锡悦就任总统后，韩国检方对文在寅前政府展开了多项调查，被文在寅方面认为是政治报复。
description.en: After Yoon Suk-yeol took office, South Korean prosecutors launched several investigations into the former Moon Jae-in administration, which Moon's side considered political retaliation.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯当选为首任中华民国大总统，象征着北洋政府的正式成立。
description.en: Yuan Shikai's election as the first President of the Republic of China symbolized the formal establishment of the Beiyang government.

description.zh-cn: 1943年12月赴延安入中共中央党校学习。
description.en: Went to Yan'an in December 1943 to study at the Party School of the Central Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 1925年12月由中国共产主义青年团团员转为中国共产党党员。
description.en: Transferred from a member of the Communist Youth League of China to a member of the Communist Party of China in December 1925.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波曾两度担任中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Bo Yibo served twice as Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1978年12月，胡耀邦主持为薄一波彻底平反，恢复了其名誉。
description.en: In December 1978, Hu Yaobang presided over the complete rehabilitation of Bo Yibo, restoring his reputation.

description.zh-cn: 与薄一波等中共元老一同商议并推动了胡耀邦的去职。
description.en: Along with Bo Yibo and other CCP elders, discussed and promoted the removal of Hu Yaobang from his post.

description.zh-cn: 经刘少奇领导的中共中央北方局建议，薄一波于1936年得以出狱。
description.en: Following a proposal from the CCP Central Committee's Northern Bureau led by Liu Shaoqi, Bo Yibo was released from prison in 1936.

description.zh-cn: 乌克兰总统弗拉基米尔·泽连斯基在俄罗斯入侵后宣布与俄罗斯断绝外交关系。
description.en: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy announced the severance of diplomatic relations with Russia after the invasion.

description.zh-cn: 在局势升级之际，美国向乌克兰运送了致命武器和军事训练计划，以提高其抵抗能力。
description.en: As tensions escalated, the United States sent lethal weapons and provided military training programs to Ukraine to enhance its defense capabilities.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜被指控向俄罗斯提供武器及派遣士兵以支持其在乌克兰的战争。
description.en: North Korea is accused of supplying weapons and sending soldiers to Russia to support its war in Ukraine.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗被指控向俄罗斯提供无人机和弹道导弹。
description.en: Iran is accused of supplying drones and ballistic missiles to Russia.

description.zh-cn: 中国被指控向俄罗斯提供经济支持、武器零组件及其他物资。
description.en: China is accused of providing economic support, weapon components, and other materials to Russia.

description.zh-cn: 2014年12月5日，周永康被开除中国共产党党籍。
description.en: On December 5, 2014, Zhou Yongkang was expelled from the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 在《要民主还是要新的独裁》中批评邓小平是“独裁者”。
description.en: Criticized Deng Xiaoping as a 'dictator' in 'Do We Want Democracy or New Dictatorship?'.

description.zh-cn: 因“反革命罪”和“阴谋颠覆政府罪”两次被判刑，累计服刑超过十八年。
description.en: Was twice sentenced to prison for 'counter-revolutionary crimes' and 'conspiring to subvert the government', serving a total of over 18 years.

description.zh-cn: 八九民运领袖王丹称呼魏京生为“民主斗士”，两人均为海外知名民运人士。
description.en: 1989 democracy movement leader Wang Dan called Wei Jingsheng a 'democracy fighter'; both are prominent overseas democracy activists.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，魏京生参加了属于首都中学红卫兵联合行动委员会的红卫兵组织。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Wei Jingsheng joined a Red Guard group that was part of the United Action Committee of Capital Red Guards.

description.zh-cn: 在文革串联期间，魏京生开始对江青等人产生怀疑，形成反对立场。
description.en: During the networking phase of the Cultural Revolution, Wei Jingsheng began to harbor suspicions about Jiang Qing and others, forming an oppositional stance.

description.zh-cn: 在安徽金寨看到大跃进饿死人的废墟后，魏京生认为毛泽东是“刽子手”。
description.en: After seeing the ruins left by the Great Leap Forward famine in Jinzhai, Anhui, Wei Jingsheng came to believe that Mao Zedong was a 'butcher'.

description.zh-cn: 在克林顿总统1998年访华前，作为中美“人质外交”的一部分，中国政府以“保外就医”名义将魏京生释放并流放到美国。
description.en: Prior to President Clinton's 1998 visit to China, as part of US-China 'hostage diplomacy', the Chinese government released Wei Jingsheng on 'medical parole' and exiled him to the United States.

description.zh-cn: 在魏京生流亡美国后，哥伦比亚大学为其提供了办公室、公寓等支持。
description.en: After Wei Jingsheng was exiled to the US, Columbia University provided him with support including an office and an apartment.

description.zh-cn: 于2001年6月中止了对魏京生的财务支出。
description.en: Terminated its financial support for Wei Jingsheng in June 2001.

description.zh-cn: 在出席北京奥运会前，布什总统在白宫会见了包括魏京生在内的五位中国自由活动人士。
description.en: Before attending the Beijing Olympics, President Bush met with five Chinese freedom activists, including Wei Jingsheng, at the White House.

description.zh-cn: 在1979年发表报道，对魏京生进行批判，并引述群众言论支持法院对魏的判决。
description.en: Published a report in 1979 criticizing Wei Jingsheng and citing public opinion in support of the court's verdict against him.

description.zh-cn: 自1824年起，新加坡正式成为英国殖民地，直到1963年加入马来西亚联邦才完全脱离英国统治。
description.en: From 1824, Singapore officially became a British colony, and only fully broke away from British rule when it joined the Federation of Malaysia in 1963.

description.zh-cn: 1963年，新加坡以独立城邦的形式加入马来西亚联邦，成为新加坡州。
description.en: In 1963, Singapore joined the Federation of Malaysia as an independent city-state, becoming the State of Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 时任马来西亚首相东姑阿都拉曼下令将新加坡州自马来西亚联邦中除名，是新加坡被迫独立的关键一步。
description.en: Then-Prime Minister of Malaysia Tunku Abdul Rahman ordered the expulsion of the State of Singapore from the Federation of Malaysia, a critical step towards Singapore's forced independence.

description.zh-cn: 隆科多是康熙帝的表弟。
description.en: Longkodo was the Kangxi Emperor's maternal cousin.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝称隆科多为舅舅，因为隆科多的姐姐孝懿仁皇后是雍正帝的嫡母。
description.en: The Yongzheng Emperor addressed Longkodo as 'maternal uncle' because Longkodo's sister, Empress Xiaoyiren, was Yongzheng's adoptive mother.

description.zh-cn: 因所属人违法，康熙帝责备隆科多不实心任事，罢免其副都统、銮仪使职务。
description.en: Due to illegal activities by his subordinates, the Kangxi Emperor reprimanded Longkodo for dereliction of duty and dismissed him from his posts as Deputy Commander and Master of the Imperial Guard.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝于康熙五十年授予隆科多步军统领之职。
description.en: The Kangxi Emperor appointed Longkodo as the Infantry Commander in the 50th year of his reign (1711).

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝继位后，立即封隆科多为总理事务大臣、吏部尚书，加太保等职务，使其成为两朝重臣。
description.en: Upon his accession, the Yongzheng Emperor immediately appointed Longkodo as Grand Minister Regent and Minister of Personnel, with the additional title of Grand Tutor, making him a powerful figure spanning two reigns.

description.zh-cn: 雍正五年，隆科多被定41款大罪，雍正帝下令从宽，将其在畅春园外禁锢，直至其于次年六月死于禁所。
description.en: In the fifth year of the Yongzheng reign (1727), Longkodo was convicted of 41 major crimes. The emperor showed leniency by commuting his sentence to confinement outside the Changchun Garden, where he died in June of the following year.

description.zh-cn: 拥有美国国籍，后于2015年放弃。
description.en: Held United States citizenship, which he renounced in 2015.

description.zh-cn: 2015年起拥有中华人民共和国国籍。
description.en: Has held People's Republic of China citizenship since 2015.

description.zh-cn: 郭松龄是张学良的恩师。
description.en: Guo Songling was Zhang Xueliang's mentor.

description.zh-cn: 在是否将孔教立为国教的问题上，康有为代表的支持方与陈独秀代表的反对方形成了尖锐的政治和思想对立。
description.en: On the issue of establishing Confucianism as the state religion, Kang Youwei, representing the proponents, and Chen Duxiu, representing the opponents, were in sharp political and ideological opposition.

description.zh-cn: 丁来富自2022年4月起担任中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军军长。
description.en: Ding Laifu has served as the commander of the PLA 73rd Group Army since April 2022.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第三十一军由华东野战军第13纵队于1949年2月改编而成。
description.en: The PLA 31st Corps was reorganized from the 13th Column of the East China Field Army in February 1949.

description.zh-cn: 胡中强担任中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军首任军长。
description.en: Hu Zhongqiang served as the first commander of the PLA 73rd Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 杨诚担任中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军首任政治委员。
description.en: Yang Cheng served as the first political commissar of the PLA 73rd Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 丁来富接替胡中强担任中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军军长。
description.en: Ding Laifu succeeded Hu Zhongqiang as the commander of the PLA 73rd Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典检方以涉嫌性犯罪为由对阿桑奇展开调查并寻求引渡，该调查最终于2019年11月中止。
description.en: Swedish prosecutors initiated an investigation and sought the extradition of Assange on allegations of sexual offenses, an investigation that was ultimately dropped in November 2019.

description.zh-cn: 据雅虎新闻报道，在维基解密发布“七号保险库”文件后，时任中情局局长迈克·蓬佩奥领导下的中情局曾讨论绑架甚至暗杀在厄瓜多尔大使馆的阿桑奇。
description.en: According to Yahoo News, after WikiLeaks published the 'Vault 7' documents, the CIA, under then-Director Mike Pompeo, discussed kidnapping and even assassinating Assange while he was in the Ecuadorian embassy.

description.zh-cn: 1949年至1971年间，由于冷战格局，中美处于全面敌对状态。美国承认退守台湾的中华民国政府，并在朝鲜战争中与中国直接交战。
description.en: From 1949 to 1971, due to the Cold War structure, China and the U.S. were in a state of comprehensive hostility. The U.S. recognized the Republic of China government in Taiwan and directly fought against China in the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 六四事件后，美国对中国实施了多项经济制裁，并停止了高层和官方的交流，使中美关系坠入低谷。
description.en: After the Tiananmen Square incident, the United States imposed multiple economic sanctions on China and suspended high-level and official exchanges, causing Sino-US relations to hit a low point.

description.zh-cn: 911袭击发生当晚，江泽民致电美国总统小布希表示同情。一个月后，小布什总统访华。
description.en: On the evening of the 9/11 attacks, Jiang Zemin called U.S. President George W. Bush to express his condolences. A month later, President Bush visited China.

description.zh-cn: 特朗普政府正式对中国进口钢铁和铝产品征收关税，并采取措施限制中国投资，引发了中美贸易战。
description.en: The Trump administration officially imposed tariffs on imported steel and aluminum products from China and took measures to restrict Chinese investment, triggering the US-China trade war.

description.zh-cn: 李承晚接替金九成为大韩民国临时政府主席。
description.en: Syngman Rhee succeeded Kim Gu as the President of the Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 金九与中国共产党保持着良好的关系。
description.en: Kim Gu maintained a good relationship with the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 金九与金日成在平壤举行的“四月南北联席会议”上会面，商讨南北统一问题。
description.en: Kim Gu and Kim Il-sung met at the 'April Joint Conference of North and South' in Pyongyang to discuss the issue of Korean unification.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国中央人民委员会追授金九祖国统一奖，以肯定他对南北统一的努力。
description.en: The Central People's Committee of the DPRK posthumously awarded Kim Gu the National Reunification Prize in recognition of his efforts for the unification of North and South Korea.

description.zh-cn: 金九多次被日本当局逮捕入狱，包括因安重根事件和安明根事件。
description.en: Kim Gu was arrested and imprisoned by Japanese authorities multiple times, including in connection with the An Jung-geun incident and the An Myeong-geun incident.

description.zh-cn: 在金九回国前，周恩来等中共政要为其举行了送别宴会。
description.en: Before Kim Gu returned to Korea, CCP dignitaries including Zhou Enlai held a farewell banquet for him.

description.zh-cn: 在九届二中全会华北组讨论中，陈伯达带头对张春桥进行批判，指责有人反对毛主席和毛泽东思想。
description.en: During the North China group discussion at the Second Plenary Session of the 9th Central Committee, Chen Boda led the criticism against Zhang Chunqiao, accusing some people of opposing Chairman Mao and Mao Zedong Thought.

description.zh-cn: 叶群是林彪的妻子。
description.en: Ye Qun was the wife of Lin Biao.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行是中华人民共和国国务院的组成部门之一。
description.en: The People's Bank of China is one of the constituent departments of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据董必武的提议，中共中央于1947年10月决定筹备建立中国人民银行。
description.en: Based on the proposal of Dong Biwu, the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China decided in October 1947 to prepare for the establishment of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 742年，李白因其才名获唐玄宗征召入京，出任翰林供奉，但两年后即被赐金放还。
description.en: In 742, Li Bai was summoned to the capital by Emperor Xuanzong due to his fame and appointed as an attendant in the Hanlin Academy, but he was dismissed with a grant of gold two years later.

description.zh-cn: 因高力士进谗言，杨贵妃开始排斥李白，导致李白失去唐玄宗的恩宠。
description.en: Due to Gao Lishi's slander, Consort Yang began to ostracize Li Bai, causing him to lose Emperor Xuanzong's favor.

description.zh-cn: 在王明主导下，主张温和处理富田事变的项英被解除中共苏区中央局代理书记职务。
description.en: Under Wang Ming's direction, Xiang Ying, who advocated a moderate handling of the Futian Incident, was removed from his position as acting secretary of the CPC Central Soviet Area Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 项英被免职后，毛泽东接替其成为中共苏区中央局代理书记及中革军委负责人。
description.en: After Xiang Ying's dismissal, Mao Zedong replaced him as the acting secretary of the CPC Central Soviet Area Bureau and head of the Central Revolutionary Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 第一次世界大战后资本主义面临的严重危机，是卢卡奇撰写该书的历史背景。
description.en: The severe crisis faced by capitalism after World War I formed the historical context for Lukács's writing of the book.

description.zh-cn: 俄国十月革命的影响是卢卡奇撰写该书的历史背景之一。
description.en: The influence of the Russian October Revolution was part of the historical context for Lukács's writing of the book.

description.zh-cn: 根据卢卡奇的观点，恩格斯将辩证法扩展到自然界是受到了黑格尔的错误引导。
description.en: According to Lukács's view, Engels was misguided by Hegel in extending dialectics to nature.

description.zh-cn: 该书所表现出来的思想被认为是“黑格尔主义的马克思主义”的一种。
description.en: The ideas expressed in the book are considered a form of 'Hegelian Marxism'.

description.zh-cn: 盖茨于1973年进入哈佛大学就读，但在大三时（1975年）退学以全身心投入微软的创建和发展。
description.en: Gates enrolled at Harvard University in 1973 but dropped out in his junior year (1975) to devote himself fully to the creation and development of Microsoft.

description.zh-cn: 就2019冠状病毒病疫情进行书信往来，盖茨在信中表达了对中国防疫行动的支持，习近平则回信表示感谢。
description.en: Corresponded regarding the COVID-19 pandemic, with Gates expressing support for China's epidemic prevention actions in his letter, and Xi Jinping replying with a letter of thanks.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党提出并不断发展中国特色社会主义理论，将其作为党的全部理论和实践的主题。
description.en: The Communist Party of China proposed and continuously developed the theory of socialism with Chinese characteristics, making it the theme of all the Party's theories and practices.

description.zh-cn: 在中共十二大上提出，要把中国建设成为高度文明、高度民主的社会主义国家，明确了中国特色社会主义初期的发展目标。
description.en: At the 12th Party Congress, he proposed to build China into a socialist country with a high level of civilization and democracy, clarifying the development goals for the initial stage of socialism with Chinese characteristics.

description.zh-cn: 在中共十三大上作报告，将中国特色社会主义的发展目标明确为建设“富强、民主、文明”的社会主义现代化国家。
description.en: Delivered a report at the 13th Party Congress, defining the development goal of socialism with Chinese characteristics as building a 'prosperous, democratic, and civilized' socialist modernized country.

description.zh-cn: 在中共十一届三中全会上，邓小平等人批评了与华国锋有直接关系的“两个凡是”，最终导致华国锋下台。
description.en: At the Third Plenum of the 11th CPC Central Committee, Deng Xiaoping and others criticized the 'Two Whatevers', which were directly linked to Hua Guofeng, ultimately leading to Hua's removal from power.

description.zh-cn: 在怀仁堂召开的中央政治局碰头会上，严厉批评张春桥打倒陈丕显的做法，该事件后被定性为“二月逆流”。
description.en: At a Politburo meeting in Huairen Hall, he severely criticized Zhang Chunqiao's actions in overthrowing Chen Pixian. The incident was later labeled the 'February Countercurrent'.

description.zh-cn: 1980年考入北京大学法律系，就读于新开设的经济法专业。
description.en: Enrolled in the Law Department of Peking University in 1980, studying in the newly established Economic Law program.

position.zh-cn: 内蒙古自治区人民政府主席
position.en: Chairwoman of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region People's Government

description.zh-cn: 在布小林担任主席期间，石泰峰任中共内蒙古自治区党委书记。
description.en: While Bu Xiaolin served as Chairwoman, Shi Taifeng was the Secretary of the CCP Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region Committee.

description.zh-cn: 投票赞成授权对伊拉克使用军事力量的决议，但后来成为该战争的批评者。
description.en: Voted in favor of the resolution authorizing military force against Iraq, but later became a critic of the war.

description.zh-cn: 在2022年俄罗斯入侵乌克兰后，坚决支持乌克兰，并领导国际社会对俄罗斯实施制裁和向乌克兰提供援助。
description.en: After the 2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine, strongly supported Ukraine, leading international efforts to sanction Russia and provide aid to Ukraine.

description.zh-cn: 大力支持芬兰加入北大西洋公约组织。
description.en: Strongly supported Finland's accession to NATO.

description.zh-cn: 大力支持瑞典加入北大西洋公约组织。
description.en: Strongly supported Sweden's accession to NATO.

description.zh-cn: 作为副总统和总统，多次与俄罗斯总统普京会晤，讨论军控和地缘政治问题。
description.en: As Vice President and President, has met with Russian President Vladimir Putin on several occasions to discuss arms control and geopolitical issues.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东是毛贻昌的儿子。
description.en: Mao Zedong was the son of Mao Yichang.

description.zh-cn: 勃列日涅夫执政时期，苏联与毛泽东领导下的中华人民共和国爆发了珍宝岛等地的边界冲突，两国关系长期敌对。
description.en: During Brezhnev's rule, the Soviet Union and the People's Republic of China under Mao Zedong had border conflicts at places like Zhenbao Island, leading to a long period of hostile relations.

description.zh-cn: 1979年，勃列日涅夫与美国总统卡特签订SALT II条约。
description.en: In 1979, Brezhnev and U.S. President Carter signed the SALT II treaty.

description.zh-cn: 1974年，勃列日涅夫与美国总统福特签订SALT I条约。
description.en: In 1974, Brezhnev and U.S. President Ford signed the SALT I treaty.

description.zh-cn: 在中国人民政治协商会议第十四届全国委员会中，王光谦担任副主席，主席是王沪宁。
description.en: In the 14th National Committee of the CPPCC, Wang Guangqian serves as Vice Chairman under Chairman Wang Huning.

description.zh-cn: 王光谦自2023年3月起担任全国政协副主席，成为副国级领导人。
description.en: Since March 2023, Wang Guangqian has served as the Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee, becoming a national-level deputy leader.

description.zh-cn: 1985年，王光谦获得清华大学水利工程硕士学位。1989年，王光谦获得清华大学水利工程博士学位。
description.en: In 1985, Wang Guangqian obtained a Master's degree in Hydraulic Engineering from Tsinghua University. In 1989, Wang Guangqian obtained a Doctoral degree in Hydraulic Engineering from Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 王光谦于1992年起在清华大学水利水电工程系任教，后成为博士生导师；并于2021年10月被任命为清华大学副校长。
description.en: Wang Guangqian began teaching at the Department of Hydraulic and Hydroelectric Engineering at Tsinghua University in 1992, later becoming a doctoral supervisor; he was also appointed as the Vice President of Tsinghua University in October 2021.

description.zh-cn: 王光谦卸任青海大学校长，由史元春接任。
description.en: Wang Guangqian stepped down as the president of Qinghai University, and was succeeded by Shi Yuanchun.

description.zh-cn: 通过微博曝光该案二审卷宗在最高人民法院神秘丢失等细节，引发社会舆论强烈关注，并促使中共中央政法委牵头成立联合调查组进行调查。
description.en: Exposed details via Weibo, such as the mysterious disappearance of the second-instance case files at the Supreme People's Court, sparking intense public attention and prompting the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission to lead a joint investigation.

description.zh-cn: 据承办法官王林清在自述视频中称，时任最高法院院长的周强曾指示将该案发回重审，后又指示判解除合同，干预了合议庭的独立审判。
description.en: According to presiding judge Wang Linqing's self-recorded video, then-President of the Supreme Court Zhou Qiang instructed to remand the case for retrial and later instructed to rule for contract termination, interfering with the independent judgment of the collegial panel.

description.zh-cn: 在陕西省政府干预司法被媒体曝光后，时任中央政法委书记的周永康作出批示，要求“正确引导舆论”，被认为是试图压制对官方的批评。
description.en: After the Shaanxi government's judicial interference was exposed by the media, then-Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission Zhou Yongkang issued an instruction to 'correctly guide public opinion,' which was seen as an attempt to suppress criticism of officials.

description.zh-cn: 1949年加入中国共产党，1964年在四清运动中被开除党籍，1978年平反后恢复党籍。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China in 1949, was expelled from the party during the Four Cleanups Movement in 1964, and had his membership restored after his rehabilitation in 1978.

description.zh-cn: 在四清运动中被开除党籍、下放劳动。
description.en: During the Four Cleanups Movement, he was expelled from the party and sent to perform manual labor.

description.zh-cn: 朱厚泽的工作表现引起时任中共中央总书记胡耀邦的注意，后出任中共中央宣传部部长，成为胡耀邦的重要助手。
description.en: Zhu Houze's work performance caught the attention of then-General Secretary Hu Yaobang. He was later appointed as the head of the CPC Central Committee's Publicity Department, becoming an important aide to Hu Yaobang.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央总书记赵紫阳创造机会使其复出，担任全国总工会领导职务。
description.en: Then-General Secretary Zhao Ziyang created an opportunity for his political comeback, appointing him to a leadership position in the All-China Federation of Trade Unions.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛接替朱厚泽出任中国共产党贵州省委员会书记。
description.en: Hu Jintao succeeded Zhu Houze as Secretary of the CPC Guizhou Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军对驻守金门的国军部队发动了榴弹炮突击，引发第二次台湾海峡危机。
description.en: The People's Liberation Army launched a howitzer assault on the ROC forces stationed in Kinmen, triggering the Second Taiwan Strait Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 金门防卫司令部副司令官吉星文在金门炮战中阵亡。
description.en: Ji Xingwen, Deputy Commander of the Kinmen Defense Command, was killed in action during the Kinmen Artillery Duel.

description.zh-cn: 钱正英于1941年9月参加了上海中共地下党组织。
description.en: Qian Zhengying joined the underground organization of the CCP in Shanghai in September 1941.

description.zh-cn: 1950年3月，经中央人民政府内政部部长曾山的推荐，钱正英被任命为华东军政委员会水利部副部长。
description.en: In March 1950, upon the recommendation of Zeng Shan, Minister of Internal Affairs of the Central People's Government, Qian Zhengying was appointed as the Vice Minister of the Ministry of Water Conservancy of the East China Military and Political Committee.

description.zh-cn: 钱正英曾任第七、八、九届全国政协副主席。
description.en: Qian Zhengying served as the Vice Chairperson of the 7th, 8th, and 9th National Committees of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 捷克斯洛伐克于1989年11月1日向钱正英颁发了“友谊勋章”。
description.en: On November 1, 1989, Czechoslovakia awarded the 'Order of Friendship' to Qian Zhengying.

description.zh-cn: 钱正英逝世后，时任全国政协主席汪洋受中共中央委托前往八宝山革命公墓为其送别。
description.en: After Qian Zhengying's death, then-Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee Wang Yang, entrusted by the CCP Central Committee, went to the Babaoshan Revolutionary Cemetery to bid her farewell.

position.en: Vice Chairperson of the CPPCC National Committee

description.zh-cn: 钱正英担任全国政协副主席期间，李瑞环是时任全国政协主席。
description.en: While Qian Zhengying served as Vice Chairperson of the CPPCC National Committee, Li Ruihuan was the serving Chairman.

position.zh-cn: 水利电力部/水利部部长
position.en: Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power / Minister of Water Resources

description.zh-cn: 钱正英担任部长期间，华国锋是时任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: While Qian Zhengying served as a minister, Hua Guofeng was the serving Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

position.zh-cn: 水利部/水利电力部部长
position.en: Minister of Water Resources / Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power

description.zh-cn: 钱正英担任部长期间，赵紫阳是时任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: While Qian Zhengying served as a minister, Zhao Ziyang was the serving Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

position.en: Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power

description.zh-cn: 钱正英担任水利电力部部长期间，李鹏是时任中华人民共和国国务院代总理及总理。
description.en: While Qian Zhengying served as Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power, Li Peng was the serving Acting Premier and Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由第十一届全国人民代表大会选举产生。
description.en: Elected by the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗被瓦剌送还后，景泰帝将其软禁于南内崇质宫，长达七年。
description.en: After Emperor Yingzong was returned by the Oirats, the Jingtai Emperor placed him under house arrest in the Southern Palace for seven years.

description.zh-cn: 在土木堡之变期间，明朝与瓦剌处于战争状态。
description.en: During the Tumu Crisis, the Ming Dynasty was in a state of war with the Oirats.

description.zh-cn: 在德米特里·梅德维杰夫担任总理期间，杰尼斯·曼图罗夫担任工业和贸易部长。
description.en: During Dmitry Medvedev's premiership, Denis Manturov served as Minister of Industry and Trade.

description.zh-cn: 在弗拉迪米尔·普丁担任总理期间，杰尼斯·曼图罗夫担任代理工业和贸易部长。在普丁担任总统期间，曼图罗夫被任命为副总理并随其出访。
description.en: During Vladimir Putin's premiership, Denis Manturov served as Acting Minister of Industry and Trade. During Putin's presidency, Manturov was appointed Deputy Prime Minister and accompanied him on foreign visits.

description.zh-cn: 弗拉迪米尔·普京签署总统令，任命杰尼斯·曼图罗夫为副总理。
description.en: Vladimir Putin signed a presidential decree appointing Denis Manturov as Deputy Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇因反对中央的宏观调控政策，曾反驳顶撞时任总理温家宝。
description.en: Chen Liangyu, opposing the central government's macroeconomic control policies, once confronted and contradicted then-Premier Wen Jiabao.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央政治局会议决定对陈良宇立案调查，并免去其在上海市一切职务，停止其在中央担任的职务。
description.en: A meeting of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee decided to open an investigation into Chen Liangyu, remove him from all his posts in Shanghai, and suspend his duties at the central level.

description.zh-cn: 代表中共中央军委发出二月来信，要求毛泽东脱离部队前往中央，试图以此调解争端。
description.en: On behalf of the CCP Central Military Commission, sent the 'February Letter' requesting Mao Zedong to leave the army for the central headquarters, in an attempt to mediate the dispute.

description.zh-cn: 在朱毛之争中，尤其是在白沙会议上，林彪毅然站到毛泽东一边，坚决支持毛，赢得了毛泽东数十年的绝对信任。
description.en: During the Zhu-Mao controversy, especially at the Baisha Conference, Lin Biao resolutely sided with and supported Mao Zedong, earning Mao's absolute trust for decades.

description.zh-cn: 在朱毛之争中，向其老上级朱德、陈毅反戈一击，转而支持毛泽东。
description.en: During the Zhu-Mao controversy, he turned against his old superiors Zhu De and Chen Yi to support Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 在白沙会议上坚决支持毛泽东。
description.en: Resolutely supported Mao Zedong at the Baisha Conference.

description.zh-cn: 在白沙会议上坚决支持毛泽东。
description.en: Resolutely supported Mao Zedong at the Baisha Conference.

description.zh-cn: 在富田事变后，利用其造成的不利影响轻易夺取了毛泽东的军权。
description.en: After the Futian Incident, he took advantage of its negative impact to easily seize military power from Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东等中国共产党高层发动了三反五反运动。
description.en: Mao Zedong and other senior leaders of the Communist Party of China launched the Three-anti and Five-anti campaigns.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党发动了三反五反运动，以“反腐败”、“反贪污”为名义。
description.en: The Communist Party of China launched the Three-anti and Five-anti campaigns under the slogans of "anti-corruption" and "anti-embezzlement".

description.zh-cn: 经毛泽东批准，三反五反运动于1952年10月结束。
description.en: With Mao Zedong's approval, the Three-anti and Five-anti campaigns ended in October 1952.

description.zh-cn: 经周恩来批准，三反五反运动于1952年10月结束。
description.en: With Zhou Enlai's approval, the Three-anti and Five-anti campaigns ended in October 1952.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平发现运动中的问题并向中共中央报告，促成了运动的结束。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping discovered problems in the campaign and reported them to the CPC Central Committee, contributing to its conclusion.

description.zh-cn: 张子善的死刑由毛泽东最终拍板决定。
description.en: The death sentence for Zhang Zishan was ultimately decided by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 时任上海副市长潘汉年于1952年2月5日做五反运动动员报告，推动了运动在上海的开展。
description.en: On February 5, 1952, then Deputy Mayor of Shanghai Pan Hannian delivered a mobilization report for the Five-anti campaign, promoting its development in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 1987年，张艺谋在其导演处女作《红高粱》中启用巩俐为女主角，使其一举成名，开启了她的演艺生涯。
description.en: In 1987, Zhang Yimou cast Gong Li as the lead actress in his directorial debut 'Red Sorghum', which made her famous overnight and launched her acting career.

description.zh-cn: 巩俐于2008年11月8日宣誓入籍新加坡，成为新加坡公民。
description.en: Gong Li took an oath to become a Singaporean citizen on November 8, 2008.

description.zh-cn: 2010年，法国文化部授予巩俐“艺术与文学勋章”司令勋位。
description.en: In 2010, the French Ministry of Culture awarded Gong Li the rank of Commander of the Ordre des Arts et des Lettres.

description.zh-cn: 2000年5月，巩俐被任命为联合国教科文组织“促进和平艺术家”。
description.en: In May 2000, Gong Li was appointed as a UNESCO Artist for Peace.

description.zh-cn: 巩俐曾担任第九届、第十届中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会委员。
description.en: Gong Li served as a member of the 9th and 10th National Committees of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 赵国因接受韩国上党郡而与意图夺取该地的秦国爆发了长平之战，两国成为敌对交战方。
description.en: The State of Zhao's acceptance of Shangdang Commandery from Han led to the Battle of Changping with the State of Qin, which also intended to seize the territory, making the two states adversaries in the war.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党三明市委员会的业务上级机构是中国共产党福建省委员会。
description.en: The operational superior of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee is the CPC Fujian Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中共福建省委批准成立中国共产党三明市委员会。
description.en: The CPC Fujian Provincial Committee approved the establishment of the CPC Sanming Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 担任中国人民政治协商会议第十四届全国委员会副主席。
description.en: Serves as Vice Chairman of the 14th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 在王沪宁担任全国政协主席期间，姜信治担任副主席。
description.en: While Wang Huning serves as Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee, Jiang Xinzhi serves as a Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 2015年12月至2017年11月任副部长，2017年11月升任常务副部长（正部长级）至2025年9月。
description.en: Served as Deputy Head from December 2015 to November 2017, and was promoted to Executive Deputy Head (minister level) from November 2017 to September 2025.

description.zh-cn: 在习近平担任中共中央总书记期间，姜信治任中共中央组织部常务副部长。
description.en: While Xi Jinping serves as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, Jiang Xinzhi served as the Executive Deputy Head of the CCP Central Organization Department.

description.zh-cn: 姜信治接替陈希出任中共中央组织部常务副部长。陈希时任中组部部长。
description.en: Jiang Xinzhi succeeded Chen Xi as Executive Deputy Head of the CCP Central Organization Department. Chen Xi was the Head of the Organization Department at the time.

description.zh-cn: 姜信治是副国级党和国家领导人。
description.en: Jiang Xinzhi is a deputy national-level party and state leader.

description.zh-cn: 1950年3月5日，西南军区成立了昆明市军事管制委员会。
description.en: On March 5, 1950, the Southwest Military Region established the Kunming Military Control Commission.

description.zh-cn: 1973年12月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China in December 1973.

description.zh-cn: 在上海市委党校第九期轮训班学习。
description.en: Attended the 9th rotation training class at the Shanghai Municipal Party School.

description.zh-cn: 杜家毫担任中共湖南省委书记期间，向以习近平为总书记的中共中央负责。
description.en: During his tenure as Secretary of the CPC Hunan Provincial Committee, Du Jiahao was responsible to the CPC Central Committee with Xi Jinping as General Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 授予杜家毫“全国优秀县委书记”称号。
description.en: Awarded Du Jiahao the title of 'National Outstanding County Party Secretary'.

description.zh-cn: 许达哲接替杜家毫，先后担任湖南省人民政府省长、中共湖南省委书记和湖南省人民代表大会常务委员会主任。
description.en: Xu Dazhe succeeded Du Jiahao, serving successively as Governor of Hunan Province, Secretary of the CPC Hunan Provincial Committee, and Director of the Standing Committee of the People's Congress of Hunan Province.

description.zh-cn: 杜家毫接替栗战书担任黑龙江省人民政府常务副省长。
description.en: Du Jiahao succeeded Li Zhanshu as Executive Vice Governor of Heilongjiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 金日成在朝鲜战争期间担任朝鲜人民军最高司令官。
description.en: Kim Il-sung served as the Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army during the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 在朝鲜战争中，朝鲜人民军与中国人民志愿军是并肩作战的盟友。
description.en: During the Korean War, the Korean People's Army and the Chinese People's Volunteer Army were allies fighting side by side.

description.zh-cn: 在御前会议上，裕仁天皇做出了接受《波茨坦宣言》条款、结束战争的“圣断”。
description.en: At the Imperial conference (Gozen Kaigi), Emperor Hirohito made the 'sacred decision' (Seidan) to accept the terms of the Potsdam Declaration and end the war.

description.zh-cn: 南唐灭亡后，李煜被俘至开封，受封为违命侯，处于宋太宗赵光义的控制之下。
description.en: After the fall of the Southern Tang, Li Yu was captured and taken to Kaifeng, where he was enfeoffed as the Marquis of Disobedience and lived under the control of Emperor Taizong, Zhao Guangyi.

description.zh-cn: 在2024年台湾大选前，与胞妹柯美兰和时任新竹市长高虹安一同出席民众党的造势活动。
description.en: Before the 2024 Taiwan general election, attended a Taiwan People's Party rally with his sister Ko Mei-lan and then-Hsinchu City Mayor Ann Kao.

description.zh-cn: 刘备在汉中之战期间担任益州牧，管辖益州地区。
description.en: Liu Bei served as the Governor of Yi Province during the Hanzhong Campaign, governing the Yi Province region.

description.zh-cn: 黄忠是刘备麾下将领，时任征西将军。
description.en: Huang Zhong was a general under Liu Bei, holding the title of General Who Conquers the West.

description.zh-cn: 赵云是刘备麾下的重要将领。
description.en: Zhao Yun was an important general serving under Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 在汉中之战中，赵云率部与曹操大军正面交锋，并使用空城计将其击退。
description.en: During the Battle of Hanzhong, Zhao Yun led his troops to confront Cao Cao's main army and repelled them using the empty fort strategy.

description.zh-cn: 根据小说《三国演义》的描述，黄忠在定军山之战中斩杀了夏侯渊。
description.en: According to the novel 'Romance of the Three Kingdoms', Huang Zhong killed Xiahou Yuan in the Battle of Mount Dingjun.

description.zh-cn: 陈子明认为刘思齐是后文革时代的“保皇毛派”。
description.en: Chen Ziming considered Liu Siqi to be a 'Royalist Maoist' of the post-Cultural Revolution era.

description.zh-cn: 改革开放后，为满足中国发展对外贸易对专业人才的迫切需求，对外贸易部决定筹建天津对外贸易学院。
description.en: After the Reform and Opening-up, to meet the urgent need for professionals in China's foreign trade development, the Ministry of Foreign Trade decided to establish the Tianjin Institute of Foreign Trade.

description.zh-cn: 天津对外贸易学院并入南开大学，原建制被撤销。
description.en: Tianjin Institute of Foreign Trade was merged into Nankai University, and its original establishment was abolished.

description.zh-cn: 段祺瑞是皖系军阀的首领。
description.en: Duan Qirui was the leader of the Anhui clique.

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞于1969年加入中国共产党，后于2020年8月17日被开除党籍。
description.en: Cai Xia joined the Chinese Communist Party in 1969 and was expelled on August 17, 2020.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央党校于2020年8月17日宣布开除蔡霞的中国共产党党籍，并取消其相关退休待遇。
description.en: On August 17, 2020, the Central Party School of the CCP announced the expulsion of Cai Xia from the Chinese Communist Party and the cancellation of her related retirement benefits.

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞于1969年参军入伍，1978年退伍。
description.en: Cai Xia joined the army in 1969 and was discharged in 1978.

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞在文化大革命期间曾是红卫兵。
description.en: Cai Xia was a Red Guard during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞于1992年考入中共中央党校，先后攻读硕士和博士学位，2000年获法学博士学位。
description.en: Cai Xia was admitted to the Central Party School of the CCP in 1992, where she pursued master's and doctoral degrees, obtaining her Doctor of Law degree in 2000.

position.en: Professor at the Party Building Teaching and Research Department

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞在中共中央党校任教，直至2012年退休。
description.en: Cai Xia taught at the Central Party School of the CCP until her retirement in 2012.

description.zh-cn: 1989年的六四事件使蔡霞对解放军向学生开火的行为感到十分震惊，影响了她的政治观点。
description.en: The 1989 Tiananmen Square incident deeply shocked Cai Xia due to the PLA's use of force against students, influencing her political views.

description.zh-cn: 2017年左右，刘亚洲因写信建议习近平调整新疆政策而被警告不要再妄议习近平的政策。
description.en: Around 2017, Liu Yazhou was warned not to question Xi Jinping's policies again after writing a letter suggesting adjustments to the Xinjiang policy.

description.zh-cn: 2020年1月上旬，习近平拒绝了总理李克强就新冠疫情启动应急响应机制的提议。
description.en: In early January 2020, Xi Jinping rejected Premier Li Keqiang's proposal to activate an emergency response mechanism for the COVID-19 outbreak.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛在2007年中共十七大报告中首次提出了“尊重党员主体地位”的论断，推动了党内民主的讨论。
description.en: In his report to the 17th Party Congress in 2007, Hu Jintao first introduced the assertion of 'respecting the principal status of party members,' promoting discussions on intra-party democracy.

description.zh-cn: 祝贺习近平当选中国共产党第十九届中央委员会总书记。
description.en: Congratulated Xi Jinping on his election as General Secretary of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 祝贺习近平当选中国共产党第十九届中央委员会总书记。
description.en: Congratulated Xi Jinping on his election as General Secretary of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 祝贺习近平当选中国共产党第十九届中央委员会总书记。
description.en: Congratulated Xi Jinping on his election as General Secretary of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1976年12月，越南劳动党改名为越南共产党。
description.en: In December 1976, the Workers' Party of Vietnam was renamed the Communist Party of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府因贪污罪判处张子善死刑并执行枪决。
description.en: The government of the People's Republic of China sentenced Zhang Zishan to death and executed him by firing squad for corruption.

description.zh-cn: 代表中国共产党第十七届中央委员会向大会作了题为《坚定不移沿着中国特色社会主义道路前进、为全面建成小康社会而奋斗》的报告。
description.en: On behalf of the 17th Central Committee of the CPC, delivered a report to the Congress titled 'Firmly March on the Path of Socialism with Chinese Characteristics and Strive to Complete the Building of a Moderately Prosperous Society in All Respects'.

description.zh-cn: 主持了大会的开幕式。
description.en: Presided over the opening ceremony of the Congress.

description.zh-cn: 李克强在2013年3月的第十二届全国人民代表大会会议上接替温家宝出任国务院总理。
description.en: Li Keqiang succeeded Wen Jiabao as Premier of the State Council at the session of the 12th National People's Congress in March 2013.

description.zh-cn: 任命李克强为中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Appointed Li Keqiang as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 选举习近平为中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Elected Xi Jinping as the President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 于十八大召开前，到北京市、河北省检查为十八大安保施工的“环京护城河”修建情况，以保障大会安全。
description.en: Before the 18th National Congress, inspected the construction of the 'Circum-Beijing Moat' security project in Beijing and Hebei to ensure the security of the Congress.
